sourceString: Virus-host interaction in relation to transmission
targetString: የቫይረስ ተሸካሚ ንክኪ ከመተላላፍ ጋር በሚገናኝ መልኩ
en-mt: In relation to the transmission of virus carrier contact

sourceString: Besides three viral factors stated above, viral interaction with host receptor is another key factor influential on interspecies transmission.
targetString: ከላይ ከተዘረዘሩት ሶስቱ የቫይራል ምክንያቶች ጎን ለጎን ከቫይራል ጋር ያለዉ ግንኙነት ከተሸካሚ ዝርያዎች መካካል ለሚደረገዉ ስርጭት ሌላኛዉ ወሳኝና ተፅዕኖ የሚፈጥር ምክንያት ነዉ።
en-mt: In addition to the three viral factors listed above, the interaction with the virus is another important and influential factor for the transmission between carrier species.

sourceString: Herein, recombination of SARS-CoV is taken as a typical example, which also showed evidence of positive selection during interspecies transmission events.
targetString: የሳርስ-ኮቭ እንደገና መቀላቀል እንደ ምሳሌ ናዉ የተወሰዳ፤ ይህም በዝርያ ዉስጥ የሚተላለፍ ክስተቶች ወቅት የአዉንታዊ ምርጫማስረጃ ያሳየም ነዉ።
en-mt: A case in point is the SARS-CoV re-emergence; This shows evidence of positive selection during inbreeding events.

sourceString: Based on the comparative analysis between isolates of human and civet SARS-CoVs, SARS-CoV is thought to undergo rapid adaptation in different hosts, particularly with mutations at the RBD of the S protein.
targetString: በንፅፅር ትንታኔ ላይ በመመስረት በሰዎች እና ጥርኝ ሳርስ-ኮቭች ፣ ሳርስ-ኮቭ መካከል የተደረገው ንጠላ፣ በተለያዩ ተሸካሚዎች ላይ ፈጣን መላመድን፣ በተለይም ደግሞ በኤስ ፕሮቲን አርቢዲ ልውውጦች ውስጥ ፈጣን መላመድን ያከናውናል።
en-mt: Based on comparative analysis, the cross between humans and SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV, performs rapid adaptation in different carriers, especially in S protein RBD exchanges.

sourceString: Generally, the RBD in the S protein of a CoV interacts with the cellular receptor and is intensely selected by the host antibody response.
targetString: በአጠቃላይ በኮቭ S ፕሮቲን ዉስጥ የሚገኝ RBD ከሴሉለር ተቀባይ ጋር የሚያገናኝ ሲሆን የፀረ እንግዳ አካል ምላሽ ተሻካሚ በስፋት የተመረጠ ነዉ።
en-mt: In general, the RBD found in the Cov S protein binds to cellular receptors and is a highly selective modulator of the antibody response.

sourceString: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is in the 318th to 510th amino acids on the S1 fragment, which binds to the human ACE2 as well as its coreceptors for viral entry.
targetString: በሳርስ-ኮቭ ዉስጥ RBDዉ ከ 318ኛ አስከ 510ኛ አሚኖ አሲድ ዉስጥ በ S1 ክፍልፋይ ላይ ይገኛል፣ ይህም የሰዉ ACE2 ለቫይራል መግቢያ ኮርሴፕተሩ ጋር የሚገናኝ ነዉ።
en-mt: In SARS-CoV, the RBD is located between amino acids 318 and 510 in the S1 segment, which binds to the human ACE2 viral entry coreceptor.

sourceString: The RBD of SARS-CoV is capable of recognizing the ACE2 receptors of various animals, including bat, civet, mouse and raccoon dog, allowing interspecies transmission of the virus.
targetString: የሳርስ-ኮቭ RBD (የመጣበቂያ ጫፍ ተቀባይ) የተለዩ እንስሳት የሌሊት ወፍ፣ ጥርኝ፣ አይጥና ራኮን ውሻ ጨምሮ የ ACE2 ተቀባዮችን የመለየት አቅም አለው፣ ይህም የቫይረሱን በይነዝርያዎች መተላለፍን ይፈቅዳል።
en-mt: The Sars-Cov RBD (receptor for adhesion tip) has the ability to bind to ACE2 receptors of different animals, including bats, rodents, mice and raccoon dogs, allowing the virus to be transmitted by mosquitoes.

sourceString: In fact, only 6 amino acid residues were observed to be different from human and civet viral isolates in the RBD and 4 of them locate in the receptor-binding motif for interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: እንዲሁም፣ 6 አሚኖ አሲድ ዝቃጮች ከሰው እና ጥርኝ ቫይረስ የተለየ ንጠላዎች ታይተዋል እና ከእነዚያ ውስጥ ለኤሲኢ2 ተቀባይ ልውውጥ ከሆኑት ውስጥ 4 የሚሆኑት በተቀባይ-ማጣበቂያ ጭብጥ ውስጥ ይገኛሉ።
en-mt: Also, 6 amino acid residues from human and rabies virus isolates were observed and 4 of those for ACE2 receptor binding were found in the receptor-adhesion motif.

sourceString: Civet SARS-CoV has K479N and S487T mutations in its RBD, which might increase the affinity of the interaction of spike protein with human ACE2 receptor.
targetString: ሲቬት ሳርስ-ኮቭ አርቢዲ (የመጣበቂያ ጫፍ ተቀባዩ) ውስጥ ኬ479ን እና ኤስ487ቲ ልውውጦች ያሉት ሲሆን የሰዎች ኤሲሲ2 ተቀባይ ውስጥ የመንጠቆ ፕሮቲን ግንኙነት ተገናኝነትን ጨምሯል።
en-mt: Civet Sars-Cov has K479 and S487T exchanges in the RBD (adherent end receptor) and increased binding affinity of the hook protein in the human ACC2 receptor.

sourceString: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions might be critical to viral adaption to humans.
targetString: በሌላ አነጋገር፣ እነዚህ ሁለቱ የአሚኖ አሲድ ቅያሪዎች ቫይረሱ ወደ ሰዉ መዛመድ እንዲችል በጣም ወሳኝ ሊሆኑ ይችላሉ።
en-mt: In other words, these two amino acid substitutions may be critical for the virus to adapt to humans.

sourceString: It is noteworthy that SARS-CoV-2 shares the same cellular receptor with SARS-CoV.
targetString: የሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ከሳርስ-ኮቭ ጋር በተመሳሳይ ሴሎች መተላለፋቸዉ እጅግ በጣም ትኩረት የሚስብ ነገር ነዉ።
en-mt: It is very interesting that SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted in the same cells as SARS-CoV.

sourceString: A 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 unit of the S protein implicates that the binding affinity of its S protein with human ACE2 might have altered.
targetString: በ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 እና ሳርስ-ኮቭ መካከል የሚገኛዉ የ 30% ልዩነት በ S1 ዩኒት የ S ፕሮቲን የሚያሳየዉ የእሱ S ፕሮቲን ከሰዉ ACE2 ጋር በጥብቅ ማገናኘት ሊቆም ይችላል።
en-mt: The 30% difference between SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV in the S1 subunit of the S protein suggests that its S protein can bind tightly to human ACE2.

sourceString: Indeed, a cryo-EM study indicates a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity of this binding than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.
targetString: በእርግጥም፣ የክሪዮ-ኢኤም ጥናቱ የሚያመላክተው በሰዎች ACE2 እና ሳርስ-ኮቭ S ፕሮቲን መካከል ካለው ይልቅ የዚህ መጣበቂያ ከ 10- እስከ 20-እጥፍ ከፍተኛ መገናኛ እንዳለው ነው።
en-mt: Indeed, the cryo-EM study indicates that this binding has a 10- to 20-fold higher affinity than that between human ACE2 and SARS-CoV S protein.

sourceString: It will also be of interest to determine whether any other coreceptor might be required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission.
targetString: ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ለመተላላፍ ሌላ የትኛዉም ዋና ተቀባይ ያስፈልግ አሊያም አያስፈልግ እንደሆነ መወሰን ያስፈልጋል።
en-mt: Whether or not any other major receptor is required for SARS-CoV-2 transmission remains to be determined.

sourceString: Intriguingly, HCoV-NL63 also binds to ACE2 but with a different part of S.
targetString: በሚያስደንቅ ሁኔታ፣ ኤችኮቭች-NL63 ከ ACE2 ይጣበቃል ነገር ግን ከሌላ S አካል ጋር ነዉ።
en-mt: Interestingly, Hkovch-NL63 binds to ACE2 but to a different S component.

sourceString: There exist many other HCoV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCoV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCoV-OC43.
targetString: ሌሎች ኤችኮቭችን የሚቀበሉ፣ እንደ አሚኖፔፕቲደዝ ኤን ለኤችኮቭች-229E፣ እና 9-O-acetylated ሲአሊክ አሲድ ለ ኤችኮቭ-ኦሲ43 ያሉ ብዙ አሉ።
en-mt: There are many other HCOV receptors, such as aminopeptidase N for HCOV-229E, and 9-O-acetylated sialic acid for HCOV-OC43.

sourceString: They might also account for successful adaptation of these CoVs in humans after interspecies transmission from their animal hosts.
targetString: ከተሸከሙት እንስሳት በዝርያ ዉስጥ ከተላለፈ በኋላ ይሄንን ኮቭች ወደ ሰዉ በተሳካ ሁኔታ በማላመድ ትልቅ ድርሻ አላቸዉ።
en-mt: They have a great role in successfully adapting this virus to humans after it has been transferred from the animals that carry it.

sourceString: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of interspecies transmission of HCoVs is also governed by other host dependency and restriction factors.
targetString: ከሴሉላር ተቀባዮች በተጨማሪ የ ኤችኮቭች ዝርያ ውስጥ የመሰራጨት ዉጤት በሌሎች ተሸካሚ ጥገኞችና ሌሎች ምክንያቶች ነዉ የሚመራው።
en-mt: In addition to cellular receptors, the outcome of transmission in the Hkovich species is governed by other carrier dependencies and other factors.

sourceString: The divergence of these host proteins between humans and natural reservoir hosts of HCoVs such as bats, dromedary camels and rodents might constitute a barrier to interspecies transmission.
targetString: በሰዎች እና እንደ ሌሊት ወፎች፣ ባለ አንድ ሻኛ ግመሎች እና ረጅም የፊት ፅርሶች ያላቸው አይጦች አይነት ተፈጥሮአዊ ዋና ተሸካሚያቸው መካከል የእነዚህ ተሸካሚ ፕሮቲኖች መለያየት በበይነዝርያዎች መተላለፍ ላይ ገደብ ሊፈጥሩ ይችላሉ።
en-mt: The separation of these carrier proteins between humans and their natural primary carriers, such as nocturnal birds, camels, and rodents with long frontal teeth, may limit interspecies transmission.

sourceString: HCoVs have to usurp host dependency factors and subvert host restriction factors for a successful interspecies transmission.
targetString: ኤችኮቭች ስኬታማ የሆነ ዝርያ ተሻጋሪ ስርጭት እንዲኖራቸው የአስተናጋጅ ጥገኝነት ጉዳዮችን ቦታ መንጠቅና የአስተናጋጅ ገዳቢዎችን መገልበጥ አለባቸው።
en-mt: For successful cross-species propagation, HCVs must overcome host dependence issues and overcome host limitations.

sourceString: In this regard, molecular determinants in this important area of virus-host interaction remain to be identified and characterized.
targetString: በዚህ ረገድ ወሳኝ በሆነዉ በቫይራለል ተሸካሚ ግንኙነት ዙሪያ የሞሎኪዩለርን የሚወስኑ፣ ገና የሚለዩና በባህሪ የሚመደቡ ናቸዉ።
en-mt: In this regard, molecular determinants of viral carrier interactions are crucial, yet to be identified and characterized.

sourceString: An unbiased genome-wide screening of host dependency and restriction factors for SARS-CoV-2 using the state-of-the-art technology of CRISPR might be fruitful.
targetString: አደላ የሌለበትን ጄኖም-አቀፍ የሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 የተሸካሚ ጥገኝነት እና ገደብ መንስኤዎች ማጣሪያ CRISPR የ-ጥበብ-ደረጃ ቴክኖሎጂን መጠቀም ጠቃሚ ሊሆን ይችላል።
en-mt: The use of state-of-the-art CRISPR technology may be useful for unbiased genome-wide screening of SARS-CoV-2 carrier dependence and restriction factors.

sourceString: Emergence of novel HCoVs: back to ground zero
targetString: የኖቭል ኤችኮቭች መነሳት: ወደ መነሻ መመለስ
en-mt: The Rise of the Novel Hkovch: Return to Origins

sourceString: The diversity of bat CoVs provides ample opportunities for the emergence of novel HCoVs.
targetString: የሌሊት ወፎች ብዝሃነት ለኖቭል ኮቮች መከሰት ከፍተኛ እድል ይፈጥራል።
en-mt: The diversity of bats creates a great opportunity for the emergence of novel coves.

sourceString: In this sense, bat CoVs serve as the gene pool of HCoVs.
targetString: በዚህ ሁኔታ፣ የሌሊት ወፍ ኮቮች እንደ ኤችኮቮች ዘረመል መሰብሰቢያ ያገለግላሉ።
en-mt: In this case, the bat coves serve as a genetic pool for Hkovs.

sourceString: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination also drive HCoV evolution and serve as two important steps in this process.
targetString: በተጨማሪ በፍጥነት መቀየርና የዘር ዳግም ቅንጅት የኤችኮቭ ሒደትን የሚወስኑ ሆነው በዚህ ሒደት ዉስጥ እንደ ሁለት ደረጃዎች ሆነው ያገለግላሉ።
en-mt: In addition, rapid mutation and genetic recombination act as two steps in this process that determine the Hkov process.

sourceString: For example, the acquisition or loss of novel protein-coding genes has the potential to drastically modify viral phenotypes.
targetString: ለምሳሌ፣ የኖቭል ፕሮቲን ሴሎች ለይቶ ማሳያት የቫይረሱን ሁኔታ ለመቀያየር ከፍተኛ አቅም አለው።
en-mt: For example, the identification of novel proteins by cells has the potential to alter the state of the virus.

sourceString: Among SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 has been thought to be important in adaptation to humans, as SARS-CoV-related bat viruses were isolated but found to encode divergent ORF8 proteins.
targetString: በሳርስ-ኮቭ መገልገያ ፕሮቲኖች መካከል፣ ከሰዎች ጋር የመላመድ ሁኔታ ላይ ኦአርኤፍ8 አስፈላጊ ሆኖ ተገኝቷል፣ ይህም እንደተነጠሉት ከሳርስ-ኮቭ ተዛማጅ የሌሊት ወፎች ቢሆንም የተለያየ ኦአርኤፍ8 ፕሮቲኖችን ለማስገባት የተገኙ ናቸው።
en-mt: Among the SARS-CoV accessory proteins, ORF8 was found to be important in adaptation to humans, which were isolated from SARS-CoV related bats but found to encode different ORF8 proteins.

sourceString: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoVs has been found in strains isolated at the beginning of the human epidemic.
targetString: የ ሳርስ-ኮቮች 29-ኒውክሎታይድ ባህሪ መጥፋት በሰው ላይ በተከሰተው ወረርሽኝ መጀመሪያ ወቅት በተነጠሉት ጥረቶች ላይ ተገኝቷል።
en-mt: A 29-nucleotide deletion characteristic of SARS-CoV was detected in isolates early in the human epidemic.

sourceString: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b and is thought to be an adaptive mutation that promotes the switch of hosts.
targetString: ይህ ስረዛ ORF8ን ወደ ORF8a እና ORF8b በማከፋፈል የተላመደ የመባዛት እርባታን ይፈጥራል።
en-mt: This deletion splits ORF8 into ORF8a and ORF8b, creating an adaptive replication fork.

sourceString: Besides, SARS-CoV has a possible recombination history with lineages of alpha- and gamma-CoVs, where a large number of smaller recombinant regions were identified in the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase.
targetString: በተጨማሪ፣ ሳርስ-ኮቭ ከኣልፋ እና ጋማ-ኮቭስ ኮቭች ጋር ታሪካዊ ግንኙነት ሊኖረው ይችላል። ምክንያቱም ጥቃቅን የተዳቀሉ ነገሮች በ RNA- ጥገኝነት RNA- ፖሊሜሬስ ውስጥ ይገኛሉ።
en-mt: Additionally, Sars-Cov may have a historical relationship with Alpha and Gamma-Covs. Because small hybrids are present in RNA-dependent RNA-polymerases.

sourceString: Recombination locations were also identified in the nsp9, most of nsp10, and parts of nsp14.
targetString: ዳግም መዋሃጃ ቦታዎች በ nsp9፣ በአብዛኛዎቹ nsp10፣ እና በ nsp14 ክፍሎች ውስጥም ታይተዋል።
en-mt: Recombination sites were also observed in nsp9, most nsp10, and nsp14 segments.

sourceString: Likewise, it has been shown that the epidemic MERS-CoV experienced recombination events between different lineages, which occurred in dromedary camels in Saudi Arabia.
targetString: በተመሳሳይ መልኩ፣ በሳውዲ አረቢያ ባለአንድ ሻኛዎች ላይ የተከሰቱት የተለያዩ ህዋሰ-ዘሮች መካከል የሜርስ-ኮቭ ወረርሽኝ የዳግም ውህደት ክስተቶች መፈጠራቸውን ሲያሳይ ነበር።
en-mt: Similarly, the MERS-CoV outbreak in Saudi Arabian singletons showed the occurrence of recombination events between different strains.

sourceString: Besides SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have also been observed in other HCoVs, in which the HCoVs recombine with other animal CoVs in their non-structural genes.
targetString: ከ ሳርስ-ኮቭ እና ሜርስ-ኮቭ በተጓዳኝ፣ በሌሎች ኤችኮቭች ውስጥ የዳግም ውህደት ክስተቶች የተስተዋሉ ሲሆን ፣ ይህም ኤችኮቭች ያለ-ቅርፅ ጂናቸው ከሌላ እንስሳ ኮቮች ጋር በድጋሚ የሚዋህዱበት ክስተት ነው።
en-mt: In addition to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, recombination events have been observed in other HCVs, in which HCVs recombine their missense genes with HCVs from other animals.

sourceString: It should also be cautioned that artificial selection can contribute to unintended changes in viral genomes, most likely resulting from relieving viruses from selection pressures exerted, such as by the host immune system.
targetString: ሰዉ-ሰራሽ አመራረጥ በተለይም እንደ ጠንካራ ተሸካሚ በሽታ የመቋቋም ስርዓት አይነት ውስጥ እንዳለው ከገቡ ምርጫ ግፊቶች ውስጥ ቫይረሱን ከመነጠል ሊመነጩ ከሚችሉ ውስጥ በቫይረሱ ዝርያ ያልተጠበቀ ለዉጥን ማምጣት ስለሚችል እጅግ በጣም ጥንቃቄ ማድረግ ያስፈልጋል።
en-mt: Artificial selection, especially in the form of a strong carrier resistance system, can lead to unexpected changes in the virus species from selective pressures that may arise from isolation of the virus.

sourceString: An example of these effects is the loss of a full-length ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain, owing to a two-nucleotide deletion.
targetString: ከእነዚሀህ ጉዳቶች ውስጥ እንደ አንድ ምሳሌ የሚሆነው በኤችኮቭ-229ኢ ፕሮታይፕ ጫና ኦአርኤፍ4 ሙሉ ርዝመት መቀነስ ነዉ፤ ይህም ሁለት ኑክሊዮቶይድ ጠፍቶ ማለት ነዉ።
en-mt: An example of these lesions is the full-length reduction of ORF4 in the HCoV-229E prototype strain; This means two nucleotides are missing.

sourceString: While intact ORF4 could be observed in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, the alpaca alpha-CoV displays a single nucleotide insertion, resulting in a frameshift.
targetString: ኦአረኤፍ4 ከ ኤችኮቭ-229ኢ ጋር የተገናኙ የሌሊት ወፍ እና ግመል ቫይረሶች ተጠቁመዋል፣ በበሽፋን ለውጥ የተነሳ የአልፓካ alpha-ኮቭ ነጠላ ኒውክሎታይድ መግቢያ አሳይቷል።
en-mt: ORF4 was identified in bat and camel viruses related to HCoV-229E, which showed a single nucleotide insertion in the alpaca alpha-cov due to a membrane mutation.

sourceString: Last but not least, the evolution of novel HCoVs is also driven by the selection pressure in their reservoir hosts.
targetString: የመጨረሻ፣ የኖቭል ኤችኮቮች ዝግመተ-ለውጥ በማከማቻ ተሸካሚዎች ውስጥ ባለው የምርጫ ግፊትም የሚመራ ነው።
en-mt: Finally, the evolution of novel Hkovs is also driven by selection pressures in storage carriers.

sourceString: Asymptomatic or only mild symptoms were detected when bats were infected with CoVs, indicating the mutual adaptation between CoVs and bats.
targetString: የሌሊት አእዋፋት በኮቭች ሲጠቁ ምንም ምልክት አይታይባቸዉም ወይም ትንሽ ምልክት ነዉ የሚያሳዩት፤ በሌሊት አእዋፋትና ኮቭች መካከል የለዉን ተስማምቶ መኖርን ነዉ የሚያሳየዉ።
en-mt: Nocturnal birds show little or no symptoms when attacked by roaches. It shows the harmony between night birds and owls.

sourceString: It appeared that bats are well adapted to CoVs anatomically and physiologically.
targetString: የሌሊት ወፎች ለሥነ-ተዋፅኦዊ እና አካላዊ በሆነ መንገድ ለኮቪዎች እንደተላመዱ ታይቷል።
en-mt: Bats have been shown to be biologically and physically adapted to coveys.

sourceString: For example, defects in the activation of pro-inflammatory response in bats efficiently reduce the pathology triggered by CoVs.
targetString: ለምሳሌ፡ በሌሊት ወፍ ሰዉነታቸዉ ከህመም ቀድመዉ የበሽታዉን ምልክት ማሳየት ባለመቻላቸዉ በኮቮች የሚመነጩትን ይቀንሳል።
en-mt: For example, in bats, they cannot show signs of illness before they are sick, so it reduces the amount produced by bats.

sourceString: Besides, the natural killer cell activity in bats is suppressed due to upregulation of inhibitory natural killer cell receptor NKG2/CD94 and low expression level of major histocompatibility complex class I molecules.
targetString: ከዚህ ጎን ለጎን፣ በሌሊት ወፍ ዉስጥ በተፈጥሮ ገዳይ የሆነ የሴል ስራዎች ጫና የሚደረግበት በተፈጥሮ ገዳይ የሆነ ሴል ተቀባይ NKG2/CD94 በላይኛው ቀጥጥር እንዳይደግ ስለሚከለላልና ወስብስብ ደረጃ I የሆኑ ሞሎኪዉልስ ትልቁ የሂስቶኮምፓተቢሊቲ ምልክት ዝቅተኛ ደረጃ መሆን ነዉ።
en-mt: In addition, in bats, suppression of natural killer cell activity inhibits the growth of the natural killer receptor NKG2/CD94 on the surface, and low levels of complex phase I molecules are a major histocompatibility marker.

sourceString: Moreover, the high level of reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from high metabolic activity of bats could both suppress CoV replication and affects proofreading by exoribonuclease, thus providing the selection pressure for the generation of virus strains highly pathogenic when introduced into a new host.
targetString: በተጨማሪ ከፍተኘ የሆነ የኦክስጅን ሪአክቲቭ (ROS) የሚመነጨዉ ከፍ ካለዉ የሌሊት አእዋፋት ሜታቦሊክ እንቅስቃሴ የኮቮች ብዜት ላይ ጫና ሊያያደርስ ወይም በኤግዞሪቦኑኩለስ እንደገና ማንበብን ሊጎዳ ይችላል፤ ስለዚህ ለቫይረሱ ጄኔሬሽን የመረጣ ግፊት ማድራግ ወዳ ኣድስ ተሸካሚ ሲገባ በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ የበሽታ መንስኤ እንዲሆን ያደርጋል።
en-mt: In addition, reactive oxygen species (ROS) generated from the elevated metabolic activity of nocturnal birds may depress the proliferation of cells or impair reprogramming by exoribonuclei; Therefore, the selection pressure for the generation of the virus will cause it to become highly pathogenic when introduced into the host.

sourceString: More pathogenic CoV strains might also evolve by recombination, leading to the acquisition of novel proteins or protein features for host adaptation.
targetString: ተጨማሪ በሽታ አምጪ የኮቭ ዘለላዎች ደግሞ በመዋሃድ ሊያድጉ ይችላሉ፣ ይህም ተሸካሚ ለመላመድ አዲስ ፕሮቲኖችን ወይም ፕሮቲን መሳይ ነገሮችን ወደማግኘት ይመራል።
en-mt: Additional pathogenic cove clusters can also grow by fusion, leading to the acquisition of new proteins or protein-like substances for host adaptation.

sourceString: Thus, it is not by chance that three novel HCoVs have emerged in the past two decades.
targetString: ስለዚህ፣ ሶሰቱ የኖቭል ኤችኮቭች ባለፉት ሁለት አስርት ዓመታት መከሰታቸዉ በአጋጣሚ አይደለም።
en-mt: Therefore, it is no coincidence that the three novel Hkovs have appeared in the last two decades.

sourceString: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their reservoir hosts such as bats and camels.
targetString: CoVች እንደ ሌሊት ወፎች እና ግመሎች አይነት ዋና ተሸካሚያቸው ላይ በሽታን የማያመጡ አይደሉም ወይም መለስተኛ ምልክቶችን የሚያስከትሉ ናቸው።
en-mt: CoVs are non-pathogenic or cause mild symptoms in their primary hosts, such as nocturnal birds and camels.

sourceString: They replicate robustly without eliciting a strong host immune response.
targetString: ጠንካራ ተሸካሚ በሽታ የመቋቋም ምላሽ ሳያገኙ እንዲሁ ይራባሉ።
en-mt: They also starve without developing a strong immune response.

sourceString: Herein lie the secrets of why asymptomatic carriers are seen and what causes the severe cases in human infection.
targetString: የበሽታ ምልክት የሌለባው ተሸካሚዎች ለምን እንደታዩ እና በሰዎች ኢንፌክሽን ላይ ለምን ከባድ ኬዝ እንደሚፈጥሩ እንቆቅልሽ የሆነው ነገር ከዚህ በመቀጠል ሰፍሯል።
en-mt: The mystery of why asymptomatic carriers appear and cause severe cases of human infection remains.

sourceString: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the hyperactivation of immune response and the cytokine storm wherein the stronger the immune response, the more severe the lung damage.
targetString: ከባድ የሆኑት የበሽታ ምልክቶች በዋነኝነት የሚከሰቱት በሽታን የመቋቋም ምላሽ ከፍተኛ ንቃት እና ጠንካራ የሆነ በሽታን የመቋቋም ምላሽ በሚኖርበት ቦታ ላይ ሳይቶኪን በብዛት በሚፈጥበት ወቅት ነው፣ እነዚህም በጣም በተባባሱ ቁጥር የሳንባ ጉዳት እየተባባሰ ይመጣል።
en-mt: The severe symptoms are mainly due to the high activation of the immune response and the production of cytokines in the area of strong immune response, the more severe the lung damage.

sourceString: In contrast, in asymptomatic carriers, the immune response has been de-coupled from CoV replication.
targetString: በተቃራኒ የምልክት ተሸካሚዎች ወስጥ የመከላከል ብቃት መልስ ከኮቭ ብዜት የተቀነሰ ነበር።
en-mt: The immune response of opposite sign carriers was subtracted from the fold of the cov.

sourceString: The same strategy of delinking the immune response might have beneficial effects in anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.
targetString: የመቋቋም ምላሽ ቁርኝትን የማላቀቅ ተመሳሳይ ስልት ለፀረ-ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ህክምና ጠቀሜታ ያላቸው ውጤቶች ሊኖሩት ይችላል።
en-mt: A similar strategy for uncoupling the resistance response may have important implications for anti-SARS-CoV-2 therapy.

sourceString: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.
targetString: የኢንተርፌሮን ምላሽ የሌሊት ወፎች ላይ በተለየ መልኩ ጠንካራ ነው።
en-mt: The interferon response is particularly strong in bats.

sourceString: Thus, administration of type I interferon at least in the early phase of SARS-CoV-2 infection in humans should be beneficial.
targetString: ስለዚህ የአይነት I ኢንተርፌሮን ማስተዳደር ቢያንስ ሰዉ ዉስጥ የሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ኢንፌክሽን መጀመሪያ አካባቢ ጠቃሚ መሆን አለበት።
en-mt: Therefore, administration of type I interferon should be beneficial at least early in human SARS-CoV-2 infection.

sourceString: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome activation in bats is defective.
targetString: በተጨማሪም፣ የNLRP3 ኢንፊሌማሶም ጅማሮ በሌሊት አእዋፋት ዉስጥ የጎደለ ነው።
en-mt: In addition, NLRP3 inflammasome initiation is lacking in nightbirds.

sourceString: By this reasoning, inhibition of NLRP3 inflammasome with MCC950 might be useful in the treatment of COVID-19.
targetString: በዚህ አመክንኒዮ የNLRP3 ኢንፊሌማሶም መጠበቅ ከMCC950 ጋራ COVID-19ን ለማከም ጥቅም ላይ ሊዉል ይችላል።
en-mt: In this mechanism, inhibition of the NLRP3 inflammasome could be used in combination with MCC950 to treat COVID-19.

sourceString: The emergence of SARS-CoV-2 follows the general theme by which SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV arose.
targetString: የሳርስ-ኮቭ እና ሜርስ-ኮቭ በተነሳበት አጠቃላይ መልኩ የሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 አመጣጥ ተከትሏል።
en-mt: The origins of SARS-CoV-2 followed in the same general pattern as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Whereas a bat beta-CoV sharing 95% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV has been found, there also exists a bat-CoV sharing 96% nucleotide homology with SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: የ ቤታ-ኮቭs ሌሊት ወፍ ሳርስ-ኮቭ የያዘች ና 95% ንኩሎቶይድ ምስስሎሽ የምትጋራ ተገኝታለች፣ በሌላ በኩል ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 የያዘች ና 96% ኒውክሎቶይድ ምስስሎሽ የምትጋራ የሌሊት ወፍ- ኮቭ አለች።
en-mt: Beta-coves were found to contain bird SARS-CoV and share 95% nucleotide similarity, while bat-cove contained SARS-CoV-2 and shared 96% nucleotide similarity.

sourceString: Whereas civets and other animals in the markets have been found to harbour viruses identical to SARS-CoV, immediate intermediate hosts for SARS-CoV-2 have not been identified.
targetString: ነገር ግን በገበያ ቦታ የሚገኙ ጥርኞች እና ሌሎች እንስሳት ከሳርስ-ኮቭ ጋር የሚመሳሳል ቫይረስ ተገኝቶባቸዋል፤ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2ን በቅርበት የሚያስተላልፉ አልተለዩም።
en-mt: But chickens and other animals in the marketplace have been found to have a virus similar to SARS-CoV; Closely transmitting SARS-CoV-2 has not been identified.

sourceString: Pangolin beta-CoVs strikingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2 have been found, indicating that pangolins might serve as one of intermediate hosts or pangolin beta-CoVs could contribute gene fragments to the final version of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ፓንጎሊን beta -ኮቭች በሚገርም ሁኔታ ለ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ሆሞሎገስ ሆኖ ተገኝቷል፣ ይህም የሚያሳየዉ ፓንጎሊኖች ተሸካሚ ከሆኑት ዉስጥ የቅርብ ሊሆኑ እነደሚችሉ ወይም ፓንጎሊን beta -ኮቭች ለመጨረሻ የ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ዓይነት የጅን ትርፍራፊዎችን ሊያዋጣ ይችላል።
en-mt: Pangolin beta-Covch was found to be surprisingly homologous to SARS-CoV-2, suggesting that pangolins may be close carriers or that pangolin beta-Covch may contribute to the eventual SARS-CoV-2 gene expression.

sourceString: Although questions remain, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 is man-made either deliberately or accidentally.
targetString: ምንም እንኳ ጥያቄዎች እንዳሉ ቢሆኑም ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ታስቦበትም ይሁን በድንገት ሰዉ ሰራሽ ነዉ ለሚለዉ ሐሳብ ምንም ማረጃ የለም።
en-mt: Although there are questions, there is no evidence that SARS-CoV-2 was deliberately or accidentally man-made.

sourceString: CoVs have returned to the limelight due to the recent outbreak of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: በቅርብ ጊዜ የ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ወረርሽኝ ስለተከሰተ ኮቭች ትኩረት ወደ ማግኘት ተመልሷል።
en-mt: With the recent outbreak of the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak, Kovacs is back in the spotlight.

sourceString: The study of CoVs in bats and other animals has drastically changed our perception of the importance of zoonotic origins and animal reservoirs of HCoVs in human transmission.
targetString: በሌሊት ወፎች እና ሌላ እንስሳት ውስጥ የኮቮችVች ጥናት ወደ ሰዎች መተላለፍ ላይ የኤችኮቮች በሽታ አምጪነት መነሻዎች እና የእንስሳት ተሸካሚዎች አስፈላጊነት ላይ ያለንን ግንዛቤ በጣም ቀይሮታል።
en-mt: The study of HCVs in bats and other animals has greatly changed our understanding of the pathogenic origins of HCVs and the importance of animal carriers in their transmission to humans.

sourceString: Pervasive evidence has shown that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 have a bat origin and are transmitted to humans via intermediate hosts.
targetString: ሳርስ-ኮቭ፣ ሜርስ-ኮቭ እና ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 መነሻው የሌሊት ወፍ እንደሆነ እና በመካከለኛ ተሸካዎች ወደ ሰዎች እንደሚተላለፍ አሳማኝ ማስረጃ ታይቷል።
en-mt: There is compelling evidence that SARS-CoV, MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 originated in bats and were transmitted to humans by intermediate vectors.

sourceString: Given that SARS-CoV infection originates from the contact between humans and civets in the markets, closing wet markets and killing civets therein could have effectively ended the SARS epidemic.
targetString: የሳርስ-ኮቭ ኢንፌክሽን የተነሳዉ በገበያ ቦታ ከሰዎችና ጥርኝ ንክኪ በመሆኑ ገበያዎች ተዘግተው ጥርኞች ቢገደሉ ኖሮ የ ሳርስ-ኮቭ ወረርሽኝ ቆሞ ነበር።
en-mt: Sars-Cov infection was caused by contact between people and cattle in the market place, if the markets were closed and the cattle were killed, the SARS-Cov epidemic would have stopped.

sourceString: By the same reasoning, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic transmission, in view of the discovery of multiple lineages of pangolin beta-CoVs closely related to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: በተመሳሳይ አመክንዮ፣ ከ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ጋር በቅርብ የሚዛመዱ የፓንጎሊን ቤታ-ኮቮች በርካታ ዘሮች መገኘታቸውን ከግምት በማስገባት የዞኒቲክ (በሽታ አምጪ ተዋህሲ ወደ ሰው) መተላለፍን ለመከላከል ፓንጎሊኖችን ከእርጥብ ገበያዎች መወገድ አለበት።
en-mt: By the same logic, given the discovery of several breeds of pangolin beta-kovs closely related to SARS-CoV-2, pangolins should be removed from wet markets to prevent zoonotic (pathogen-to-human) transmission.

sourceString: However, whether and how SARS-CoV-2 is transmitted to humans through pangolins and other mammals remain to be clarified in future investigations.
targetString: ይሁን እንጂ፣ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 በፓንጎሊንና ሌሎች እንስሳት አማካኝነት ወደ ሰዉ ይተላለፍ አይተላላፍ ወይም እንዴት እንደሚተላላፍ ወደፊት በጥናት የሚረጋጋጥ ይሆናል።
en-mt: However, whether or how SARS-CoV-2 can be transmitted to humans through pangolins and other animals remains to be determined in future studies.

sourceString: On the other hand, MERS-CoV has existed in dromedary camels for a long time.
targetString: በሌላ በኩል ሜርስ-ኮቭ ባለ አንድ ሻኛ ግመል ዉስጥ ለረጅም ጊዜ ይገኝ ነበር።
en-mt: On the other hand, Mers-Cove has been around for a long time.

sourceString: These camels serve as an important tool for transportation as well as a main source of meat, milk, leather and wool products for the local people.
targetString: እነዚህ ግመሎች ለአካባቢው ማህበረሰብ ለመጓጓዣ፣ ስጋ፣ ወተት፣ ለሱፍና ለቆዳ ውጤቶች መስሪያ የሚያገለግሉ ናቸዉ።
en-mt: These camels are used for transportation, meat, milk, wool and leather products for the local community.

sourceString: They are widely distributed across the Middle East and Africa.
targetString: ከመካከለኛው ምስራቅ እስከ አፍሪካ በስፋት ተሰራጭተዋል።
en-mt: They are widely distributed from the Middle East to Africa.

sourceString: It is therefore impossible to sacrifice all camels for the control of MERS, as what was done in wild animal markets in China to prevent the spreading of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ስለዚህ ሜርስንን ለመከላከል ሲባል ልክ በቻይና የሳርስ-ኮቭና ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ስርጭት ለመግታት የዱር እንስሳት ገበያ ላይ እንደተደረገው ሁሉንም ግመሎች መሰዋት አይቻልም።
en-mt: Therefore, in order to prevent MERS, it is not possible to sacrifice all the camels, as was done in the wild animal markets in China to stop the spread of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: To stop the recurrent outbreaks of MERS, a comprehensive approach should be taken to develop effective vaccines against MERS-CoV for camels, in combination with other infection control measures.
targetString: በተደጋጋሚ የሚከሰተዉን የሜርስ ወረርሽኝ ለማስቆም፣ የተጠቃለለ መንገድ መከተል አስፈላጊ ሲሆን የሚጠቅመውም ከሌሎች አንፌክሽን ቁጥጥር እርምጃዎች ጋር በመሆን ግመልን ከሚያጠቃው ሜርስ-ኮቭ የሚከላከሉ ውጤታማ ክትባቶችን ለማግኘት ነዉ።
en-mt: To stop recurrent outbreaks of MERS, an integrated approach is necessary, and it is useful to find effective vaccines against MERS-Cov, which infects camels, along with other infection control measures.

sourceString: As we are not able to eliminate these viruses, new genotypes might emerge to cause outbreaks.
targetString: እነዚህን ቫይረሶች ማስወገድ ስላልቻልን፥ ወረርሽኞችን የሚያስከትሉ አዳዲስ ዘረ ተውሳኮች ሊከሰቱ ይችላሉ።
en-mt: Because we are unable to eliminate these viruses, new strains can emerge that cause epidemics.

sourceString: A variety of zoonotic CoVs are circulating in the wild.
targetString: የተለያዩ የዞኖቲክ ኮቭች በዱር ዉስጥ እየተንቀሳቀሱ ናቸዉ።
en-mt: A variety of zoonotic fungi are active in the wild.

sourceString: Particularly, bat CoVs with zoonotic potential are so diverse.
targetString: በተለይም፣ በሽታን የማምጣት አቅም ያላቸው የሌሊት ወፍ ኮቮች በጣም የተለዩ ናቸው።
en-mt: In particular, bat coves with the potential to carry disease are highly isolated.

sourceString: There are plenty of opportunities that these zoonotic CoVs evolve and recombine, resulting in the emergence of new CoVs that are more transmissible and/or deadly in humans in future.
targetString: እነዚህ የዞኖቲክ ኮቭች ተለዉጦና እንደገና አንድ ላይ ሆኖ አዲስ ኮቭች በጣም ተላላፊ እና/ወይም ወደፊት ለሰዉ ልጆች ገዳይ እንደሚሆኑ ብዙ እድሎች ኣሏቸዉ።
en-mt: There is a high chance that these zoonotic strains will mutate and recombine to form new strains that will be highly infectious and/or lethal to humans in the future.

sourceString: The culture of eating wild animals in some places of China should be abandoned to reduce unnecessary contact between humans and animals.
targetString: በሰዎችና እንስሳት መካካል ያለዉን አላስፈላጊ ንክኪ ለመቀነስ በቻይና አንዳንድ አካባቢ ዉስጥ የዱር እንስሳትን ለምግብነት ማዋል መቅረት አለበት።
en-mt: In order to reduce the unnecessary contact between people and animals, the use of wild animals for food should be avoided in some areas of China.

sourceString: With the ordeals of SARS, MERS and COVID-19, a better preparedness and response plan should be in place.
targetString: ከሳርስ፣ ሜርስ እና COVID-19 አደገኛነት አንጻር፤ ከፍተኛ ዝግጁነት እና ቶሎ ለመታከም ሙሉ ሆኖ መጠበቅ ያስፈልጋል።
en-mt: Given the dangers of SARS, MERS and COVID-19; There is a need for high preparedness and complete waiting for immediate treatment.

sourceString: In fact, many viruses have existed in the planet for a very long time.
targetString: በእውነቱ፥ በርካታ ቫይረሶች በፕላኔቷ ላይ በጣም ለረጅም ጊዜ ቆይተዋል።
en-mt: In fact, many viruses have been around the planet for a very long time.

sourceString: They stay in their own natural reservoirs until there is a chance for spillover.
targetString: ለመሰራጨት አመቺ የሆነ ሁኔታ እስኪፈጠር ድረስ በራሳቸዉ ተፈጥሯዊ ሁኔታ ዉስጥ ይቆያሉ።
en-mt: They will remain in their natural state until conditions are favorable for propagation.

sourceString: Although bats have many features that favours the spreading of viruses, the chance for humans to be in contact with bats and other wildlife species can be minimized if people are educated to stay away from them.
targetString: ምንም እንኳ የሌሊት ወፎች ቫይረሶችን ለማስተላለፍ ብዙ እድሎች ቢኖረቸዉም ሰዎች ከእነሱ እንዲርቁ ካወቁ ከሌሊት ወፎችና ሌሎች የዱር እንስሳት ጋር ያላቸዉ ንክኪ ይቀንሳል።
en-mt: Although bats have many opportunities to transmit viruses, if people know to stay away from them, contact with bats and other wild animals will be reduced.

sourceString: Continuous surveillance in mammals is necessary for better understanding of the ecology of CoVs and their natural hosts, which will prove useful in preventing animal-to-human transmission and future outbreaks.
targetString: በአጥቢ እንስሳት ላይ የማያቋርጥ ክትትል ማድረግ የኮቮችን እና የተፈጥሮአዊ ተሸካሚዎቻቸውን ስነ-ምህዳር በተሻለ መልኩ ለመረዳት አስፈላጊ ሲሆን ይህም ከእንስሳ ወደ ሰው የበሽታ መተላለፍን እና የወደፊት ወረርሽኞችን ለመከላከል ያለውን ጠቀሜታ ያረጋግጣል።
en-mt: Continuous monitoring of mammals is essential to better understand the ecology of coveys and their natural carriers, which will prove valuable in preventing animal-to-human disease transmission and future outbreaks.

sourceString: To conclude, the most effective way to prevent viral zoonosis is for humans to stay away from the ecological niches of the natural reservoirs of the zoonotic viruses.
targetString: ለማጠቃለል፥ የቫይረስ አምጪ ተዋህሲ መነሻን ለመከላከል ለሰዎች በጣም ውጤታማው መንገድ የሚሆነው በሽታ አምጪ ቫይረሶችን በተፈጥሮ ተሸካሚ ከሆነው ስነ-ምህዳራዊ መነሻ መራቅ ነው።
en-mt: In conclusion, the most effective way for humans to prevent the introduction of pathogenic viruses is to avoid ecological sources that naturally carry pathogenic viruses.

sourceString: Several pieces in the puzzle of the zoonotic origin of SARS-CoV-2 are still missing.
targetString: በ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ምንጭ መላምት ውስጥ ብዙ ጥቃቅን የሆኑ ነገሮች ይጎላሉ።
en-mt: Several nuances emerge in the hypothesis of the origin of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: First, if bats transmit an ancestral virus of SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it will be of interest to see under what circumstances bats and pangolins could share the same ecological niche.
targetString: የሌሊት ወፍ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 በዘር ወደ ፓንጎሊን የምታስተላልፍ ከሆነ የሌሊት ወፍ እና ፓንጎሊን የሚያመሳስላቸዉ ምን እነደሆነ ማጥናት ያስፈልጋል።
en-mt: If bats can genetically transmit SARS-CoV-2 to pangolins, it is necessary to study what bats and pangolins have in common.

sourceString: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human transmission, how humans get into contact with bats should be determined.
targetString: ሁለተኛ፥ የሌሊት ወፎች ወደ ሰው በሚፈጠር የቫይረስ መተላለፍ ውስጥ ይበልጥ ቀጥተኛ ሚና የሚጫወቱ ከሆነ፥ ሰዎች ከሌሊት ወፎች ጋር እንዴት ሊነካኩ እንደሚችሉ መታወቅ አለበት።
en-mt: Second, if bats play a more direct role in human-to-human transmission of the virus, it is important to know how humans may interact with bats.

sourceString: Third, if a third mammal acts as the true intermediate host, how it interacts with the different species including humans, bats and pangolins has to be clarified.
targetString: በሶስተኛ ደረጃ ሶስተኛ አጥቢ እንስሳ እዉነተኛ አስተላላፊ ከሆነ ሰዎችን፣ የሌሊት አእዋፋትና ፓንጎሊንስ ጨምሮ ከሌሎች ዝርያዎች ጋር እንዴት እንደሚገናኝ ግልፅ መደረግ አለበት።
en-mt: Third, if a third mammal is a true vector, it needs to be clarified how it interacts with other species, including humans, bats, and pangolins.

sourceString: Finally, since many mammals including domestic animals might be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, both surveillance and experimental infection should be conducted.
targetString: በመጨረሻ ብዙ አጥቢ እንስሳት የቤት እንስሳትንም ጨምሮ ለ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ተጋላጭ ሊሆኑ ስለሚችሉ የኢንፌክሽን ክትትልና ምርምር ሁለቱም መደረግ አለባቸው።
en-mt: Finally, many mammals, including domestic animals, may be susceptible to SARS-CoV-2, so both infection surveillance and research should be conducted.

sourceString: Should it be a bat, a pangolin or another mammal, it is expected that SARS-CoV-2 or its parental viruses that are almost identical will be identified in its natural hosts in future.
targetString: የሌሊት ወፍ፣ ፓንጎሊን ወይም ሌሎች እንስሳት ቢሆኑ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ወይም የሱ ተዛማጅ ቫይረሶችና የሚመሳሰሉ ወደ ፊት በተፈጥሮ ተሸካሚ እንደሚተዋቅ ነዉ የሚጠበቀዉ።
en-mt: Whether bats, pangolins or other animals are expected to be natural carriers of SARS-CoV-2 or related viruses in the future.

sourceString: Continued investigations in this area will elucidate the evolutionary pathway of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with important implications in the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.
targetString: በዚህ ዘርፍ ውስጥ ቀጣይነት ያላቸው ምርምሮች በእንስሳት ውስጥ የ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ዝግመተ-ለውጣዊ አካሄድን፣ በሰዎች ውስጥ COVID-19 ን ለመከላከል እና ለመቆጣጠር ከሚረዱ ጥቆማዎች ጋር ያብራራሉ።
en-mt: Ongoing research in this area will elucidate the evolution of SARS-CoV-2 in animals, with recommendations for the prevention and control of COVID-19 in humans.

sourceString: Updating the diagnostic criteria of COVID-19 “suspected case” and “confirmed case” is necessary
targetString: የ COVID-19 የተጠረጠረ ጉዳይ እና ያልተረጋገጠ ጉዳይ ምርመራ መስፈርትን ማዘመን አስፈላጊ ነው
en-mt: It is important to update the diagnostic criteria for suspected and unconfirmed cases of COVID-19

sourceString: On 6 February 2020, our team had published a rapid advice guideline for diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guideline provided our experience and make well reference for fighting against this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: በ 6 የካቲት 2020፣ቡድናቻችን የ 2019 ኖቭል ኮሮናቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) ኢንፌክሽንን ለመመርመር እና ለማከም ፈጣን የምክር መመሪያን አሳትሟል እናም ይህ መመሪያ ተሞክሮአችንን ያቀርባል እናም በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ ከዚህ ወረርሽኝ ጋር ለመዋጋት ጥሩ ማጣቀሻ ይሰጣል።
en-mt: On 6 February 2020, our team published a quick advisory guide for the diagnosis and treatment of 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) infection, and this guide presents our experience and provides a good reference for fighting this epidemic worldwide.

sourceString: However, the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge are gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ሆኖም ግን፣ የኮሮና ቫይረስ በሽታ 2019 (COVID-19) አዲስ በሽታ ነው፣ እየቀጠለ ባለው የምርምር ግኝቶች እና ክሊኒካል ልምምዶች ልምዶች አማካኝነት እውቀታችን እና ንቃታችን ቀስ በቀስ እየጨመረ ይገኛል፤ ስለሆነም፣ የምርመራው እና ህክምናው ስልቶች የቅርብ መሆናቸውም ቀጥሏል።
en-mt: However, coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is a new disease, and our knowledge and awareness is gradually increasing through ongoing research findings and clinical practice experiences; Consequently, diagnostic and treatment strategies continue to be limited.

sourceString: In this letter, we answered one comment on our guideline and provided the newest diagnostic criteria of “suspected case” and “confirmed case” according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) that issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China.
targetString: በዚህ ደብዳቤ ውስጥ በመመሪያችን ላይ ለአስተያየታችን መልስ የሰጠንና የቻይና ህዝብ ሪፑብሊክ የህዝብ ጤና ኮሚቴ ባወጣው አአዲሱ የዲያግኖሲስ ምርመራ እና በሕክምና መመሪያው መሠረት ለ COVID-19 (ሰባተኛ ሥሪት) በተሰጡት የቅርብ ጊዜ የምርመራ እና የህክምና መመሪያዎች መሠረት አዲሱን የምርመራ መስፈርት አቅርበናል።
en-mt: In this letter, we responded to our comments on the guidelines and proposed new diagnostic criteria based on the latest diagnostic and treatment guidelines for COVID-19 (seventh version) issued by the Public Health Committee of the People's Republic of China.

sourceString: In December 2019, the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) has caused an outbreak, which is now officially named as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: በታህሳስ ወር 2019፣ የኖቭል ኮሮናቫይረስ (2019-nCoV)ወረርሽኝ አስከትሏል ፣ በአሁኑ ጊዜ በይፋ ተብሎ የተጠራው የኮሮናቫይረስ በሽታ 2019 (COVID-19) እና ቫይረሱ ከባድ የመተንፈሻ አካላት ሲንድሮም ኮሮናቫይረስ 2 (ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2) የሚል ስያሜ ተሰጥቶታል።
en-mt: In December 2019, the novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) caused an outbreak, now officially known as coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the virus has been named severe respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, WHO characterized COVID-19 as a pandemic.
targetString: በማርች 11፣ 2020 ላይ፣ WHO COVID-19 ን ዓለም አቀፍ ወረርሽኝ ሲል አስቀምጦታል።
en-mt: On March 11, 2020, the WHO declared COVID-19 a global pandemic.

sourceString: In order to fight against the SARS-CoV-2 infection, our team has developed a rapid advice guideline and that has been published online in Military Medical Research on 06 February 2020.
targetString: ከ SARS-CoV-2 በሽታ ጋር ለመዋጋት፣ ቡድናችን ፈጣን የምክር መመሪያ አዘጋጅቶ በ ፌብሩዋሪ 06∕2020 በወታደራዊ የህክምና ምርምር ኦንላይን ታትሟል።
en-mt: To combat the SARS-CoV-2 disease, our team developed a rapid advisory guide and published it online on February 06∕2020 in Military Medical Research.

sourceString: It has attracted a great attention since published.
targetString: ከታተመ ጀምሮ ከፍተኛ ትኩረት ሳቢ ሆኗል።
en-mt: It has attracted a lot of attention since its publication.

sourceString: Note however that COVID-19 is a new disease, our awareness and knowledge is gradually increasing based on the ongoing research findings and clinical practice experience; hence, the strategies of diagnosis and treatment are also continually updated.
targetString: ሆኖም COVID-19 አዲስ በሽታ መሆኑን ልብ ይበሉ ፣ አሁን ባለው የምርምር ግኝቶች እና ክሊኒካዊ ልምምድ ልምዶች ላይ በመመርኮዝ የእኛ ግንዛቤ እና እውቀት ቀስ በቀስ እየጨመረ ነው፤ ስለሆነም የምርመራው እና የሕክምናው ስልቶች እንዲሁ በተከታታይ ይሻሻላሉ።
en-mt: However, keep in mind that COVID-19 is a new disease, and our understanding and knowledge is slowly increasing based on current research findings and clinical practice experiences; Therefore, diagnostic and treatment strategies are also continuously improved.

sourceString: For instance the Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 issued by the National Health Committee of the People’s Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), among 16 January 2020 to 3 March 2020, has issued a total of seven editions with some contexts being substantively changed.
targetString: ለምሳሌ ፣ በቻይና ህዝብ ሪፑብሊክ ብሔራዊ የጤና ኮሚቴ (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/) የተሰጠው የ COVID-19 የምርመራ እና የሕክምና መመሪያዎች ፣ እ.ኤ.አ. ከጥር 16 ቀን 2020 እስከ 3 መጋቢት 2020 ድረስ ባለው ጊዜ ውስጥ በድምሩ ሰባት እትሞችን ያወጣ ሲሆን፣ የተወሰኑ አውዶች በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ተቀይረዋል።
en-mt: For example, the guidelines for diagnosis and treatment of COVID-19 issued by the National Health Commission of the People's Republic of China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), ed. It ran a total of seven editions between 16 January 2020 and 3 March 2020, and some contexts have changed significantly.

sourceString: Now our guideline received a comment by Zhou et al., they introduced a simple scoring proposal based on their clinical experience.
targetString: አሁን የእኛ መመሪያ ከእነዝሁ አስተያየት ተቀብሏል ፣ እነሱ በክሊኒካዊ ልምዳቸው ላይ በመመርኮዝ ቀለል ያለ የውጤት አሰጣጥ ሀሳብ አቅርበዋል።
en-mt: Now that our guidelines have received feedback from you, they have proposed a simplified scoring system based on their clinical experience.

sourceString: Their work added new evidence for our guideline and also make valuable reference for this pandemic worldwide.
targetString: ሥራቸው ለእኛ መመሪያ አዲስ ማስረጃን ያመጣ ሲሆን በዓለም ዙሪያ ለዚህ ወረርሽኝ ጠቃሚ ዋጋም ይሰጣል።
en-mt: Their work brings new evidence for our guidance and provides important value for this epidemic around the world.

sourceString: We endorse their significant work and express our thanks.
targetString: ለዚህ ወሳኝ ተግባር ድጋፋችንን የምንሰጥ ሲሆን፣ ምስጋናችንንም እንገልጻለን።
en-mt: We give our support and express our gratitude for this important work.

sourceString: However, their work also needs update according to the latest Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines for COVID-19 (Trial seventh version) and recently studies.
targetString: ሆኖም ፣ በ COVID-19 (የሙከራ ሰባተኛ ሥሪት) እና በቅርብ ጥናቶች የቅርብ ጊዜ ምርመራ እና ሕክምና መመሪያዎች መሠረት ስራቸው እንዲሁ ማዘመኛ ይፈልጋል።
en-mt: However, their work also needs updating based on the latest diagnostic and treatment guidelines for COVID-19 (7th version of the trial) and recent studies.

sourceString: According to the seventh edition (3 March 2020), to confirm the suspected case needs to combine any one item of epidemiological history features with two items of clinical manifestations to make a comprehensive analysis, or needs to meet three items of clinical manifestations if without clear epidemiological history:
targetString: በሰባተኛው እትም (ማርች 3∕2020) መሠረት የተጠርጣሪው ጉዳይ አጠቃላይ ምርመራን ለማካሄድ ሁለት ክሊኒካዊ መገለጫዎች ሁለት ንጥሎችን ማካተት እንደሚያስፈልገው ለማረጋገጥ ወይም ግልጽ ካልሆነ በስተቀር ሶስት ክሊኒካዊ ኤፒዲሚዮሎጂያዊ ታሪክመገለጫዎችን ማሟላት አለበት:
en-mt: According to the seventh edition (March 3∕2020), the suspected case must meet three clinical epidemiological history profiles unless it is clear that two clinical profiles need to include two items in order to carry out a comprehensive investigation:

sourceString: Epidemiological history: (1) a history of travel or residence in Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 cases had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (2) a history of contact with SARS-CoV-2 infectious cases (with positive nucleic acid test); (3) a history of contacting with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms from Wuhan city and surrounding areas, or other communities where COVID-19 had been reported in the last 14 days before symptom onset; (4) a history of contacting with cluster of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases with fever and/or respiratory symptoms occurred within 2 weeks in small areas, such as home, office, class of school, etc).
targetString: ኤፒዲሚዮሎጂያዊ ታሪክ፡ (1) የበሽታው ምልክት ከመጀመሩ በፊት በ 14 ቀናት ውስጥ COVID-19 ጉዳዮች ሪፖርት የተደረጉባቸው በ ውሃን ከተማ እና በአከባቢዋ፣ ወይም በሌሎች የ COVID-19 ጉዳዮች ላይ ሪፖርት የተደረጉ የጉዞ ወይም የመኖራቸውን ታሪክ፣ (2) ከሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 ተላላፊ ጉዳዮች ጋር ግንኙነት የመፍጠር ታሪክ (ከአሉሚክ አሲድ ምርመራ ጋር)፣ (3) የበሽታው ምልክት ከመጀመራቸው በፊት ከዉሀን ከተማ እና ከአከባቢዎች፣ ወይም ከ COVID-19 ጋር በተያያዙ ሌሎች ማህበረሰቦች ውስጥ ትኩሳት ወይም የመተንፈሻ ምልክቶች ከታመሙ በሽተኞች ጋር የመገናኘት ታሪክ፣ (4) ከተረጋገጡ ጉዳዮች ስብስብ (ማለትም በቤት፣ በቢሮ፣ በት/ቤት ወዘተ...) ባሉ ትናንሽ አካባቢዎች በ 2 ሳምንቶች ውስጥ የተከሰቱት የተረጋገጠ ኬዞች ዝርዝር (≥ 2 ኬዞች)።
en-mt: Epidemiological history: (1) history of travel to or presence of other reported cases of COVID-19 in the city of Wanda, or its surroundings, where cases of COVID-19 have been reported in the 14 days before the onset of symptoms; (2) history of infection with SARS-CoV-2; contact history with cases (with alumic acid test), (3) history of contact with patients with fever or respiratory symptoms in Wuhan and surrounding areas, or other communities associated with COVID-19 before the onset of symptoms, (4) a cohort of confirmed cases List of confirmed cases (≥ 2 cases) occurring within 2 weeks in small areas (ie home, office, school etc.).

sourceString: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/ or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging features of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell counts showing normal, decreased, or reduced lymphocyte count in the early onset stage.
targetString: ክሊኒካዊ መገለጫዎች፡ (1) ትኩሳት እና/ወይም የመተንፈሻ ምልክቶች፤ (2) ከ COVID-19 ኢንፌክሽን የምስል ዋና መለያ ባህሪያቶች ጋር፤ (3) መደበኛ፣ የቀነሰ፣ ወይም በመጀመሪያ ደረጃ ወቅት የቀነሰ ሊምፎሳይት ቁጥሮችን የሚያሳይ አጠቃላይ የነጭ ደም ሴሎች ቁጥር።
en-mt: Clinical manifestations: (1) fever and/or respiratory symptoms; (2) with imaging hallmarks of COVID-19 infection; (3) total white blood cell count showing normal, decreased, or decreased lymphocyte numbers during the first phase;

sourceString: Diagnosing the confirmed case should base on suspected case with any one item of pathogenic or serological evidence as following: (1) real-time PCR test positive for SARS-CoV-2; (2) viral whole genome sequencing showing high homogeneity to the known novel coronaviruses; (3) positive for the specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in serum test; or a change of the SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody from negative to positive, or titer rising ≥4 times in the recovery phase above that in the acute phase.
targetString: የተረጋገጠውን ጉዳይ መመርመር በሚከተለው በተጠረጠሩበት ጉዳይ ላይ የተመሠረተ መሆን አለበት።(1) ለ SARS- CoV-2 የእውነተኛ ጊዜ የ PCR ሙከራ ፖዘቲቭ፤ (2) ለታወቀው ኖቭል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ከፍተኛ ግብረኝነትን የሚያሳይ የቫይረስ አጠቃላይ የጂኖም ቅደም ተከተል ፤ (3) የሴረም ምርመራ ለተወሰነ IgM ፀረ-ሰው እና ለ IgG ፀረ-ሰው ለ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2 በሰም ፈተና ውስጥ አዎንታዊ ፣ ወይም ከ ሳርስ-ኮቭ-2-የተወሰነ IgG አንቲቦዲ ከአንድ ነጌቲቭ ወደ ፖዘቲቭ ፣ ወይም ከከባድ ጊዜ በላይ ባለው የማገገሚያ ደረጃ ላይ ከ 4 እጥፍ የሚበልጥ ለውጥ።
en-mt: Diagnosis of a confirmed case should be based on the following suspected cases: (1) positive real-time PCR test for SARS- CoV-2; (2) the complete genome sequence of a virus showing high affinity for a known novel coronavirus; (3) Serum test for specific IgM antibody and IgG antibody to SARS-CoV-2 in wax test positive, or change from negative to positive for SARS-CoV-2-specific IgG antibody, or during recovery stage beyond acute period. A more than 4-fold change in

sourceString: We can see that the real-time PCR test for nucleic acid in respiratory tract or blood samples was added to the second (18 January 2020) and third (22 January 2020) editions.
targetString: nucleic acid ን በመተንፈሻ አካላት ወይም ለደም ናሙናዎች የእውነተኛ ጊዜ PCR ሙከራ ለ ማየት ይቻላል ለሁለተኛ (ጃንዋሪ 18∕2020) እና ሶስተኛ (ጃንዋሪ 22∕2020) እትሞች ላይ ተጨምሯል።
en-mt: Real-time PCR testing for nucleic acid in respiratory or blood samples has been added to the second (January 18∕2020) and third (January 22∕2020) editions.

sourceString: The pathogenic detection of blood sample was added to the fourth (27 January 2020) and fifth (8 February 2020) editions; and then the serological evidence was added to the seventh edition.
targetString: የደም ናሙናው የበሽታ ምርመራ በአራተኛው (ጥር 27∕2020) እና አምስተኛው (የካቲት 8∕2020) እትሞች ላይ ተጨምሮ ነበር። ከዚያም ሰሮሎጅካል ማስረጃ በሰባተኛው እትም ላይ ታክሏል።
en-mt: The blood sample diagnostic was added to the fourth (January 27∕2020) and fifth (February 8∕2020) editions. Then serological evidence was added in the seventh edition.

sourceString: These modifications based on the researchers continued work that to search for an optimal nucleic acid detection kit for rapid diagnosis, as well as the samples from respiratory tract including blood sampling, which increased the availability of different specimens, and supported bringing the specific antibody positive result into the confirmed criteria.
targetString: በተመራማሪዎቹ ቀጣይ ስራ ላይ የተመሰረቱት እነዚህ ማስተካከያዎች ለፈጣን ምርመራ የሚረዳ ጥሩ ኑክሊክ አሲድ መፈለጊያ መሳሪያ እንዲሁም የደም ናሙናን ጨምሮ ከመተንፈሻ አካላት የተለያዩ ናሙናዎችን በመጨመር እና ልዩ ፀረ-ሰው አወንታዊ ውጤትን በተረጋገጠው መመዘኛ ውስጥ ለማምጣት የሚረዱ ናቸው።
en-mt: These modifications, based on the researchers' ongoing work, include a better nucleic acid detection tool for rapid testing, as well as the addition of various samples from the respiratory tract, including blood samples, to produce a specific antibody positive result within the established criteria.

sourceString: Besides, there are more and more evidence that remind us to caution with the atypical symptomatic and asymptomatic patients.
targetString: ከዚህም ባሻገር፣ ከተፈጥዊ ምልክት የሚያሳይ እና የማያሳይ ታካሚዎች እንድንጠነቀቅ የሚያሳስቡን ብዙ እና ተጨማሪ መረጃዎች አሉ።
en-mt: Furthermore, there is more and more evidence to caution us against patients with and without spontaneous symptoms.

sourceString: Hence, the flow chart of Zhou et al. should be updated, as they classified the person without clinical symptoms as “low risk”.
targetString: ስለዚህ፣ የክሊኒካል ምልክቶች የሌላቸው ሰዎች እንደ ትንሽ አስጊ ስለተፈረጁ፣ የ Zhou et al. ሂደት ሰንጠረዝ መታደስ አለበት።
en-mt: Therefore, because people without clinical symptoms were classified as low-risk, Zhou et al. Process table should be updated.

sourceString: The score system also needs to be verified in further clinical practice and studies.
targetString: የውጤት ሥርዓቱ በተጨማሪ ክሊኒካዊ ልምምዶች እና ጥናቶች ውስጥ መረጋገጥ አለበት።
en-mt: The scoring system needs to be validated in further clinical trials and studies.

sourceString: To conclude, we hope more direct evidence coming up and call for readers to provide their comments.
targetString: ለማጠቃለል፣ ቀጥተኛ ማስረጃ ይመጣልና አንባቢዎች አስተያየታቸውን እንዲሰጡ ጥሪ እናቀርባለን።
en-mt: In conclusion, direct evidence is forthcoming and we invite readers to comment.

sourceString: For the diagnosis of “suspected case” and “confirmed case”, we suggest to trace and obey the newest guidelines of their home countries.
targetString: “ያልታሰበ ጉዳይ” እና “ያልተረጋገጠ ክስ” ምርመራ ለማድረግ ፣ የትውልድ ሃገሮቻቸውን አዳዲስ መመሪያዎችን መከታተል እና መታዘዝን እንመክራለን።
en-mt: We recommend following and obeying the new guidelines of their countries of origin to investigate "unsuspected case" and "unconfirmed case".

sourceString: Our team will also timely update our guideline to offer help.
targetString: እርዳታ ለማቅረብ የእኛን መመሪያ ቡድናችን በየጊዜው ያዘምነዋል።
en-mt: Our team regularly updates our guide to provide assistance.

sourceString: Bangladesh reports five new deaths due to COVID-19, a daily highest
targetString: ባንግላዴሽ በCOVID-19 ምክንያት የቀኑ ከፍተኛ አምስት አዳዲስ ሞቶች መከሰታቸውን ዘግቧል
en-mt: Bangladesh has reported the highest five new deaths of the day due to COVID-19

sourceString: Yesterday, Bangladesh has confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 on the day.
targetString: ትናንት፣ በ COVID-19 የተነሳ በዚያን ቀንአምስት አዳዲስ ሞት መመዝገቡን ባንግላዴሽ አረጋግጧ።
en-mt: Yesterday, Bangladesh confirmed five new deaths due to COVID-19 that day.

sourceString: This is the highest number of fatalities in a day due to the virus.
targetString: ይህ በቫይረሱ ​​ምክንያት በአንድ ቀን ውስጥ የተመዘገበ ከፍተኛው የሞት መጠን ነው።
en-mt: This is the highest number of deaths recorded in a single day due to the virus.

sourceString: As of yesterday, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) reported the number of recorded infected cases included 114 active cases and 33 recovered cases who were staying home.
targetString: እስከ ትላንት ጊዜ ድረስ፣ የባንግላዲሽ ኤፒዲሚዮሎጂ፣ የበሽታ ቁጥጥር እና ምርምር ተቋም (IEDCR) 114 በህክምና ላይ ያሉ እና 33 አገግመው ቤታቸው የተቀመጡ ጉዳዮችን ያካተተ በበሽታው የተያዙ ጉዳቶችን መዝግቦ ሪፖርት አድርጓል።
en-mt: As of yesterday, the Bangladesh Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) recorded and reported 114 cases of the disease, which included 114 treated and 33 discharged cases.

sourceString: A total of 17 deaths have been recorded.
targetString: በድምሩ የ 17 ሰዎች ሞት ተመዝግቧል።
en-mt: A total of 17 deaths were recorded.

sourceString: In an online news briefing, the director of IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, said the fatalities included four males and one female.
targetString: የኦንላይን ዜና ማጠቃለያ ውስጥ የ IEDCR ዳይሬክተር ዶክተር መሪጃደዲይ ሳብሪና ፍሎራ በበኩላቸው፣ ከሟቾቹ ውስጥ አራት ወንዶችና አንድ ሴት ይገኙበታል ብለው ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: In an online news summary, IEDCR Director Dr. Mirijadei Sabrina Flora said that four men and one woman were among the dead.

sourceString: According to Dr Meerjady, two cases were aged above 60, two between 51 and 60, and one 41-50 years old.
targetString: በዶክተር ሜርጃዲይ ገለጻ መሰረት ዕድሜያቸው ከ 60 ዓመት በላይ የሆኑ ሁለት ታካሚዎች፣ ከ 51 እስከ 60 የሆኑ ሁለት እንዲሁም አንድ 41 - 50 ዓመት የሆናቸው ናቸው።
en-mt: According to Dr. Merjadi, two patients were over 60 years old, two were between 51 and 60, and one was between 41 and 50 years old.

sourceString: She also said two of the victims were from Dhaka.
targetString: ከሰለባዎቹ መካከል ሁለቱ ከዳካ የመጡ ናቸውም ብለዋል።
en-mt: He said two of the victims were from Dhaka.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic on March 11.
targetString: በመጋቢት 11 የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት CIDID-19 ን እንደ ወረርሽኝ አወጀ።
en-mt: On March 11, the World Health Organization declared CIDID-19 a pandemic.

sourceString: A hospital official told Anadolu Agency, a local news outlet, that one of the deceased was Jalal Saifur Rahman, a director of Bengali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was cared for at the Kuwait Maitree Hospital.
targetString: ከሟቾቹ መካከል በ Kuwait Maitree Hospital ውስጥ ክትትል ሲደረገግላቸው የነበረሩት የቤኒጋሊ የፀረ-ሙስና ኮሚሽን ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት Jalal Saifur Rahman መሆናቸውን የሆስፒታሉ ባለስልጣን ለ Anadolu ኤጀንሲ የአካባቢው የዜና ማሰራጫ አሳውቋል።
en-mt: Among the dead was Jalal Saifur Rahman, director of the Benigali Anti-Corruption Commission, who was being treated at Kuwait's Maitree Hospital, a hospital official told local news outlet Anadolu Agency.

sourceString: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladeshi Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would be shut down for longer than initially planned, until this coming Saturday.
targetString: ቅዳሜ ላይ፣ በመስመር ቪዲዮ ማስታወቂያ ላይ የባንግላዴሽ የመንገድ ትራንስፖርት እና ድልድዮች ሚኒስትር Obaidul Quader የህዝብ መጓጓዣ መጀመሪያ ታቅዶ ከነበረው በላይ እስከ መጪው ቅዳሜ ድረስ ይዘጋል ብለዋል።
en-mt: On Saturday, in an online video announcement, Bangladesh's Road Transport and Bridges Minister Obaidul Quader said public transport would remain closed until next Saturday, longer than originally planned.

sourceString: This public transport shutdown had initially started on March 26 and was planned to end on Saturday, April 4.
targetString: ይህ የህዝብ ትራንስፖርት መዘጋት መጀመሪያ መጋቢት 26 የጀመረ ሲሆን ቅዳሜ፣ ኤፕሪል 4 ላይ ለማቆም ታቅዷል።
en-mt: This public transport closure originally started on March 26 and is scheduled to end on Saturday, April 4.

sourceString: Transport of essential goods -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.
targetString: የአስፈላጊ ዕቃዎች መጓጓዣ -- የሕክምና፣ ነዳጅ እና ምግብ -- አሁንም ድረስ ተፈቅዶ ነበር።
en-mt: Transportation of essential supplies -- medical, fuel and food -- was still allowed.

sourceString: The first recorded incidents of COVID-19 infection in Bangladesh were on March 8, in two people who returned from Italy and also the wife of one of them.
targetString: ለመጀመሪያ ጊዜ የተመዘገበው COVID-19 በሽታ ክስተት በባንግላዴሽ ውስጥ መጋቢት 8 ሲሆን ከጣሊያን በተመለሱ ሁለት ሰዎች እና የአንዳቸው ሚስትም ነበረች።
en-mt: The first recorded case of COVID-19 was in Bangladesh on March 8, involving two people and their wife who had returned from Italy.

sourceString: As of March 19, these three had already recovered.
targetString: ከመጋቢት 19 ጀምሮ እነዚህ ሦስቱ ቀድሞውኑ ማገገም ችለዋል።
en-mt: As of March 19, these three have already recovered.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 surpasses one million infections worldwide
targetString: በዓለም ላይ በ SARS-CoV-2 ተጠቂዎች ቁጥር ከአንድ ሚሊዮን አልፏል
en-mt: The number of SARS-CoV-2 victims in the world has exceeded one million

sourceString: On Thursday, the total number of cases of the SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus infections surpassed one million worldwide, Johns Hopkins University data indicated.
targetString: ሐሙስ ቀን የ SARS-CoV-2 ኮሮና ቫይረስ ተጠቂዎች ጠቅላላ ቁጥር በዓለም ዙሪያ ከአንድ ሚሊዮን በላይ ማለፍ መቻሉን የጆንስ ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርሲቲ መረጃ አመልክቷል።
en-mt: On Thursday, the total number of SARS-CoV-2 corona virus victims worldwide exceeded one million, according to data from Johns Hopkins University.

sourceString: At least 52 thousand deaths were linked to COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus.
targetString: ቢያንስ 52 ሞቶች በኮሮናቫይረስ ከተከሰተ በሽታ ጋር ተገናኝተዋል።
en-mt: At least 52 deaths have been linked to the coronavirus.

sourceString: The milestone came the same day Malawi confirmed its first coronavirus infections and Zambia had its first coronavirus-related death.
targetString: ማላዊ የመጀመሪያውን የኮሮናቫይረስ ተጠቂዎች መኖራቸውን ባረጋገጠችበት ተመሳሳይ ቀንዛምቢያ የመጀመሪያውን ከኮሮናቫይረስ ጋር የተዛመደ ሞት ተስተቶባታል።
en-mt: The same day that Malawi confirmed its first cases of the coronavirus, Zambia reported its first coronavirus-related death.

sourceString: North Korea claimed, as of Thursday, it was one of the few countries remaining free of coronavirus infections.
targetString: ሰሜን ኮሪያ ከሐሙስ ጀምሮ ከኮሮናቫይረስ በሽታ ነፃ ሆነው ከቀሩት ጥቂት አገራት ውስጥ አንዷ መሆኗን ገልጻለች።
en-mt: As of Thursday, North Korea claimed to be one of the few remaining countries free of the coronavirus.

sourceString: By yesterday, the World Health Organization reported 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases in the twenty four hours preceding 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4.
targetString: እ.ኤ.አ. በኤፕሪል 4 ከመካከለኛው አውሮፓ ሰዓት (0800 UTC) ከረፋዱ 10 ሰዓት በኋላ ባሉት ሃያ አራት ሰዓታት ውስጥ 79,332 ጉዳዮችን ጨምሮ በጥቅሉ 1,051,635 የተረጋገጡ ተጠቂዎች መገኘታቸውን የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ትናንት አሳውቋል።
en-mt: In the year In the twenty-four hours after 10 a.m. Central European Time (0800 UTC) on April 4, the World Health Organization announced yesterday that there were a total of 1,051,635 confirmed cases, including 79,332 cases.

sourceString: In the United States, over 244 thousand coronavirus cases were recorded, linking to at least 5,900 deaths.
targetString: በዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ቢያንስ ከ 5,900 ሰዎች ሞት ጋር ተያይዞ ከ 244 ሺህ በላይ የኮሮና ቫይረስ ጉዳቶች ተመዝግበዋል።
en-mt: In the United States, at least 5,900 people have died, and more than 244,000 cases of the virus have been recorded.

sourceString: CBS News reported, citing Johns Hopkins University data, there were over 1,000 US deaths on Wednesday caused by coronavirus infections.
targetString: CBS News የ Johns Hopkins University መረጃን በመጥቀስ እንደዘገበው፣ ረቡዕ ዕለት በኮሮና ቫይረስ ኢንፌክሽን ምክንያት አሜሪካ ውስጥ ከ 1,000 በላይ ሰዎች ሞተዋል።
en-mt: According to CBS News citing data from Johns Hopkins University, more than 1,000 people died in the United States due to the corona virus infection on Wednesday.

sourceString: Around the world, countries announced stricter measures to inhibit the disease from spreading.
targetString: በዓለም ዙሪያ፥ አገራት የበሽታውን ስርጭት ለመግታት ጥብቅ እርምጃዎችን መወሰናቸውን አስታውቀዋል።
en-mt: Around the world, countries have announced strict measures to curb the spread of the disease.

sourceString: On Thursday, Sergei Sobyanin, the mayor of Moscow, extended the city lockdown to May 1.
targetString: ሐሙስ ዕለት፣ የሞስኮ ከንቲባ Sergei Sobyanin የከተማዋን ቤት ውስጥ የመቆየት ጊዜ እስከ ሜይ 1 ድረስ አራዘሙ።
en-mt: On Thursday, Moscow Mayor Sergei Sobyanin extended the city's stay-at-home order until May 1.

sourceString: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin declared Russians would continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.
targetString: በሀገር አቀፍ ደረጃ ፕሬዝዳንት Vladimir Putin ሩሲያውያን እስከ ሚያዚያ 30 ድረስ ወደ ሥራ ሳይሄዱ ክፍያ መቀበላቸውን እንደሚቀጥሉ አስታውቀዋል።
en-mt: Nationally, President Vladimir Putin has announced that Russians will continue to be paid without going to work until April 30.

sourceString: The parliament of Portugal voted to extend the national state of emergency by 15 days; the vote passed with 215 votes in favor, ten abstentions, and one vote against.
targetString: የፖርቱጋል ፓርላማው 215 የድጋፍ ድምፅ፣ 10 ድምፀ ተአቅቦና 1 የተቃውሞ ድምፅ በማሳለፍ የብሔራዊ የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ አዋጁን ለ15 ቀን ለማራዘም ወስኗል።
en-mt: The Portuguese parliament decided to extend the national emergency for 15 days by passing 215 votes in favor, 10 abstentions and 1 vote against.

sourceString: Saudi Arabia extended curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to last the entire day; previously, the curfew was only in effect between 3 p.m. and 6 a.m.
targetString: ሳኡዲ አረቢያ በመካ እና መዲና የተቀደሱ ከተሞች ውስጥ የሚደረጉ የሰዓት እላፊዎች ሙሉ ቀን እንዲቆዩ አራዘመች፤ ከዚህ ቀደም፣ እገዳው ከ ከሰዓት በኋላ 3 ሰዓት እና ጧት 6 ሰዓት መሃል ብቻ ነበር ተፈጻሚ የነበረው።
en-mt: Saudi Arabia extends curfews in the holy cities of Mecca and Medina to a full day; Previously, the ban was only in effect between 3pm and 6am.

sourceString: Thailand planned to implement a curfew between 10 p.m. and 4 a.m.
targetString: ታይላንድ በ 10 ማታ እና 4 ሌሊት የሰዓት እላፊ ገደብ ለመተግበር እቅድ ይዛለች።
en-mt: Thailand plans to implement a 10 a.m. and 4 a.m. curfew.

sourceString: The governor of Ohio, Mike DeWine, announced the state had extended its stay-at-home order until May 1.
targetString: የ Ohio ሃገረ ገዥ Mike DeWine ግዛቱ በቤት ውስጥ የመቆየት ትእዛዙን እስከ ሜይ 1 ድረስ ማራዘሙን አስታውቀዋል።
en-mt: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced that the state has extended the stay-at-home order until May 1.

sourceString: Stores in Australia lower toilet paper limits per transaction
targetString: በአውስትራሊያ ውስጥ የሚገኙ መደብሮች የመጸዳጃ ቤት ወረቀትን ገደብን በአንድ ግብይት ዝቅ አድርገዋል
en-mt: Stores in Australia have lowered the toilet paper limit per transaction

sourceString: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian store chains Woolworths and Coles lowered their purchase restrictions on toilet paper to two and one package per transaction in all stores on national level, respectively.
targetString: እሑድ እና ቅዳሜ ምሽት የአውስትራሊያ ሱቅ ሰንሰለቶች ዌልዎርዝ እና ኮልስ በብሔራዊ ደረጃ በሚገኙ ሁሉም መደብሮች ውስጥ በአንድ የሽያጭ የመጸዳጃ ወረቀት ላይ የሽያጭ ገደቦችን ለሁለት እና ለአንድ ጥቅል ዝቅ ብለው ቀንሰዋል።
en-mt: On Sunday and Saturday evening, Australian supermarket chains Wellworth and Coles reduced sales limits on a single roll of toilet paper to two and one roll in all stores nationally.

sourceString: ALDI also introduced a one-pack limit, on Monday.
targetString: ALDIም ዋን ፓክ ገደብን ሰኞ እለት አስተዋዉቋል።
en-mt: ALDI also introduced the One Pack limit on Monday.

sourceString: These limitations were posted as messages on the checkouts, and on the chains' Facebook pages.
targetString: እነዚህ ገደቦች፣ በገንዘብ ማውጫዎች እና በፌስቡክ ገፆች ትስስሮች ላይ ተለጥፈው ነበር።
en-mt: These restrictions were posted on links to money directories and Facebook pages.

sourceString: Buyers were reportedly stocking up due to fears of COVID-19 in case people need to self-isolate.
targetString: ሸማቾች COVID-19ን በመፍራት ምክንያት እና ለይቶ-መቆየት ሊኖር ይችላል በሚል ምክንያት ሸቀጦችን እንዳከማቹ ሪፖርት ተደርጓል።
en-mt: Consumers are reportedly hoarding goods due to fears of COVID-19 and possible quarantine.

sourceString: On Wednesday, Woolworths also limited toilet paper purchases for home delivery to one pack per order.
targetString: እሮብ ቀን፣ Woolworths ወደ ቤት የሚወሰዱ የመጸዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት/ሶፍት ግዥዎችን በትዕዛዝ ወደ አንድ ጥቅል አውርደዋል።
en-mt: On Wednesday, Woolworths reduced take-home toilet paper/soft purchases to one pack per order.

sourceString: These changes followed the previous four-pack per transaction restriction introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.
targetString: እነዚህ ለውጦች መጋቢት 4 እና 5 እንደ ቅደም ተከተላቸው በ Woolworths እና Coles የተዋወቀውን የቀድሞውን አራት-ጥቅል በየልውውጡ ገደብ ተከትለዋል።
en-mt: These changes follow the previous four-pack at the exchange limit introduced by Woolworths and Coles on March 4 and 5 respectively.

sourceString: Coles, in its March 8 media release, reported that with the four-pack restriction in place, "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery", and called the demand "unprecedented", while ALDI, in a Facebook post on Tuesday, called it "unexpected".
targetString: ኮልስ በማርች 8 የመገናኛ ብዙሃን ጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ ላይ በአራት-እገዳው እቅድን በመተግበር ላይ “ብዙ መደብሮች በሚላኩ በአንድ ሰዓት ውስጥ አሁንም እየሸጡ ናቸው” እና ፍላጎቱ “ከዚህ በፊት ታይቶ የማያውቅ” በማለት ALDI በፌስ ቡክ ላይ በማክሰኞ ፅሁፉ “ያልተጠበቀ” ሲል ጠርቶታል።
en-mt: Coles said in a March 8 media press release that implementing the four-block plan "many stores are still selling out within an hour of delivery" and demand is "unprecedented," which ALDI called "unexpected" in a Facebook post on Tuesday.

sourceString: Sales went up in a "sharp increase" last week, according to a Woolworths spokesperson.
targetString: ባለፈው ሳምንት የ Woolworths ቃል አቀባይ እንዳለው ከሆነ ሽያጭ “ከፍተኛ ጭማሪ” አሳይቷል።
en-mt: Last week, a Woolworths spokesman said sales were "significantly up".

sourceString: Costco's store in Canberra also limited the allowed amount to two packs last week.
targetString: በካንቤራ ያለው የ Costco መደብር ባለፈው ሳምንት የተፈቀደውን መጠን ወደ ሁለት እሽግ ገድቧል።
en-mt: A Costco store in Canberra last week limited the amount allowed to two packs.

sourceString: To further alleviate the shortage, Coles ordered bigger packages from suppliers and increased delivery frequency, Woolworths ordered extra stock, while ALDI made stocks for a planned Wednesday special available early.
targetString: እጥረቱን በደንብ ለመቀነስ፣ Coles ተለቅ ያሉ ጥቅሎችን ከአቅራቢዎች አዟል እና የማድረስ ድግግሞሽን ጨምሯል፤ ዎልዎርዝስ በበኩሉ ተጨማሪ ለሽያጭ የተዘጋጁ እቃዎችን አዟል፣ ALDI ደግሞ ለታቀደ ረቡዕ አስቀድሞ ልዩ የሚገኙ ሽያጮችን አዘጋጅቷል።
en-mt: To drastically reduce the shortage, Coles ordered larger packages from suppliers and increased the frequency of deliveries; Woolworths, meanwhile, has ordered more items ready for sale, while ALDI has already prepared special availability sales for the planned Wednesday.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Australian Retailers Association, said that retailers try to raise stock, but local council restrictions on the timing of truck-deliveries make it hard.
targetString: የችርቻሮ ሻጮች ማህበር ስራ አስፈፃሚ ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት ሩሴል ዚሜርማን፣ ችርቻሮ ሽጮች ሽያጩን ከፍ ማድረግ ይፈልጋሉ፣ ሆኖም የከባድ መኪና-ማድረሻ ጊዜ ላይ የአካባቢው ምክር ቤት ያኖራቸው ገደቦች ከባድ እንዲሆን አድርጎታል ብለው ተናረዋል።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman, executive director of the Retailers Association, said retailers want to increase sales, but local council restrictions on truck-delivery times have made it difficult.

sourceString: He expects rising production costs, as suppliers try to meet demand, and fewer specials.
targetString: አቅራቢዎች እና ሌሎች የተላዩ የሆኑ ፊላጎቶችን ለማዳረስ ስጠብቁ የምርት ዋጋ እንደሚቀንስ ይጠብቃል።
en-mt: Expect product prices to drop as suppliers and other different fleets wait to deliver.

sourceString: On Tuesday, ALDI announced that following the early release of stock, some stores can't run the Wednesday special.
targetString: ስቶክ አስቀድሞ መለቀቁን ተከትሎ የተወሰኑ መጋዘኖች የእሮብ ልዩ ቀን እንደማያካሄዱ ALDI ሰኞ እለት አስታዉቆ ነበር።
en-mt: ALDI announced on Monday that some warehouses would not be running a Wednesday special day following stock being released early.

sourceString: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, retail expert from Queensland University of Technology, said the stores fill the stock every night.
targetString: በ News.com.au ሪፖርት ውስጥ፣ ከክዊንላንድ የቴክኖሎጂ ዩኒቨርስቲ የችርቻሮ ባለሙያ የሆኑት Dr Gary Mortimer ፣ መደብሮቹ ለሽያጭ የተዘጋጁ ነገሮች በየሌሊቱ እንደሚሞሉ ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: In a News.com.au report, Dr Gary Mortimer, a retail expert from Queenland University of Technology, said the stores were filled with items for sale every night.

sourceString: He remarked toilet paper is a bulky item, leading to low quantity of stocks in numbers, and, when sold out, leaves vast shelf spaces empty, hardening the feeling of a shortage.
targetString: የመጸዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት/ሶፍት ተለቅ ያለ እቃ ነው፣ ይህም በመደብሮች ውስጥ በአነስተኛ ቁጥር እንዲኖር ያደርገዋል እና በሚሸጥበት ወቅት፣ ክፍት ሰፊ የመደርደሪያ ቦታ ይፈጠራል፣ ይህም እጥረት የመኖሩን ስሜት ይፈጥራል።
en-mt: Toilet paper/soft is a larger item, which makes it available in smaller quantities in stores and when sold, creates a wide open shelf space, creating a sense of scarcity.

sourceString: "Coles and Woolworths have a view [that] if there was plenty of stuff on the shelf, if product like toilet rolls and sanitiser could be [bought] and are there in quantities, you would probably minimise the panic" said Russell Zimmerman per ABC News.
targetString: እንደ ABC ዘገበ "ኮልስ እና ዉልዎርዝስ ያለቸዉ ሀሳብ ብዙ እቃዎች በመደርደሪያ ላይ ብኖሩ፣ ለመፀዳጀ የሚያገለግሉ ሳኒታይዘር እና ፎጣ ተገስቶ በብዛት ካሉ የሚፈጠረዉን ድኒጋጤ መቀናስ ትችላለቹ" አለ ሩሴል ዝመርማን።
en-mt: According to ABC, "The idea at Coles and Woolworths is that if you have more items on the shelves, if you have more hand sanitizer and towels, you can reduce the panic," Russell Zimmerman said.

sourceString: Recycled toilet paper producer Who Gives a Crap said on last Wednesday they'd run out of stock.
targetString: ተቆርቋሪው የድግመ-ኡደት የመጸዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት አምራች ክምችታቸው ሊያልቅ እንደሆነ ባለፈው ረቡዕ ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: A concerned manufacturer of recycled toilet paper said last Wednesday that they were about to run out of stock.

sourceString: Kimberly-Clark, which makes Kleenex Toilet Tissue, and Solaris Paper which makes Sorbent, emphasized they were working 24/7 to maintain the supply, according to the News.com.au report.
targetString: Kimberly-Clark ፣ የክኔክስ የመፀዳጃ ቤት ሶፍት፣ እና ሶላሪስ ወረቀት ይህም ቆሻሻ መሰብሰቢያ የሚሰራ ሲሆን፣ በ News.com.au ዘገባ መሰረት አቅርቦት ለመደገፍ 24/7 እንደሚሰሩ ጠቁመዋል።
en-mt: Kimberly-Clark, Knex Toilet Soft, and Solaris Paper, which operates waste collection, have indicated they are working 24/7 to support supply, according to a News.com.au report.

sourceString: Domain.com, a real estate site, reported some property sellers offering free toilet paper to the first bidder on auctions in Melbourne, when fewer auctions were held because of buyers having time off on the long weekend of Labour Day.
targetString: የሪል ስቴት ድረ-ገፅ Domain.com፣ ጥቂት ጨረታዎች ሰራተኛ ቀን ረጅም ሳምንት ላይ ገዢዎች እረፍት ላይ በመሆናቸው ጥቂት ጨረታዎች ስለማይከናወኑ፣ በሜልቦርን ውስጥ ጨረታ ላይ ለመጀመሪያ አመልካች ነፃ የመፀዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት/ሶፍት የሚሰጡ አንዳንድ የንብረት ሻጮችን ሪፖርት አድርጓል።
en-mt: Real estate website Domain.com reports some property sellers are offering free toilet paper/soft to the first bidder at auctions in Melbourne, as fewer auctions take place over the Labor Day long week as buyers are off.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: በዳርዊን በየእለቱ የሚታተመው የ NT News የሃሙስ እትም፣ ለመቅደድ እና እንደ መፀዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት ጥቅም ላይ የሚውል የስምንት-ገፅ ግብዓት አካቷል።
en-mt: Thursday's edition of the NT News, published daily in Darwin, included an eight-page resource that could be torn up and used as toilet paper.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: መጋዘኖቹ መጀመሪያ ላይ እገዳዎችን ለመጣል ፍቃደኛ አልነበሩም፣ በ ማርች 3 ከ ABC Australia በተደረገው ዘገባ መሰረት ግዢዎች ላይ ገደቦችን ለማስተዋወቅ የሚያስችል እቅዶች እንዳልነበራቸው ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: The warehouses initially refused to impose restrictions, saying they had no plans to introduce restrictions on purchases, according to a March 3 report from ABC Australia.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman ማስኮች፣ ሳኒታይዘር፣ ደረቅ እቃዎ፣ የእጅ ማጠቢያ እና ዱቄት ጨምሮ ሌሎች ምርቶች ጭምር በከፍተኛ ፍላጎት ላይ እንዳሉ አክለዋል።
en-mt: Russell Zimmerman added that other products including masks, sanitizers, dry goods, hand wash and powder are also in high demand.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: በተመሳሳይ ሁኔታ፣ ከአዉስትራሊያ ዉጪ የቢሪትሽ ኦንላይን ኦካዶ ሱፐርማርኬት የአንድሬስ መፃዳጃ ወራቀት 12 እስር ብቻ እንደሚሸጥ እሁድ እለት አስታዉቆ ነበር።
en-mt: Similarly, outside Australia, British online supermarket Ocado announced on Sunday that it will sell just 12 units of Andres's anti-aging formula.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: የአለም ጤና ድርጅት COVID-19 ን አለም አቀፍ ወረርሽኝ በማለት አውጇል
en-mt: The World Health Organization has declared COVID-19 as a global pandemic

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: ረቡዕብ እለት፣ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት (WHO) አሁን የCOVID-19 ስርጭትን በኮሮናቫይረስ SARS-CoV-2 የሚከሰት አለም አቀፍ ወረርሽኝ ሲል አውጇል።
en-mt: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) has now declared the spread of COVID-19 as a global pandemic caused by the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: “ፓነምክ” የሚለዉ ቃል የተወሰነ ኬዝ ምን የክል ከባድ እንደሆና ሳይሆን በሽዉ ምን የክል እንደ ተሰፋፋ ብቻ ነዉ፤ የአ.ጤ.ድ መንግስታት አፋጣኝ እርምጃ እድወስዱ አመላክቷል:
en-mt: The word "panemk" does not mean how serious a particular case is, but only how wide it is. He indicated that the governments of A.D. should take immediate action.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: "ሁሉም አገሮች የዚህን ወረርሽኝ አካሄድ አሁንም መቀየር ይችላሉ።
en-mt: "All countries can still change the course of this epidemic.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ዋና ዳይሬክተር ቴድሮስ አድሃኖም ገብረእየሱስ እንዳሉት " አገራት ከመረመሩ፣ ካከሙ፣ ከለዩ፣ ፍለጋ ካደረጉ ለህዝቡ ምላሽ ካገኙ"።
en-mt: According to Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, Director General of the World Health Organization, "If countries test, treat, identify, and search, they will respond to the population."

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: በሽታው በጣም አስከፊና አሳሳቢ ከመሆኑ አንጻር ተገቢ የሆነ እርምጃ እንዲወሰድ ከፍተኛ ትኩረት እናደርጋለን።
en-mt: Considering that the disease is very dangerous and serious, we will pay great attention to take appropriate action.

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: በቀድሞው የአሜሪካ የበሽታ ቁጥጥር እና መከላከል ዳይሬክተር፣ ዶ/ር Tom Frieden፣ መሰረት ወረርሽኙ "ታይቶ የማይታወቅ" ተብሏል።
en-mt: According to the former director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Dr. Tom Frieden, the outbreak is "unprecedented."

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: በፌብሩዋሪ ወር ላይ በ CNN በታተመው አስተያየቶች ላይ፣ "ከመከሰት አንስቶ እስከ ቀጣዩ አለም አቀፍ ስርጭት ድረስ ከኢንፍሉዌንዛ ሌላ ምንም የመተንፈሻ አካል ቫይረስ አልተከሰተም" ብሎ ተናግሯል።
en-mt: In comments published by CNN in February, he said, "From outbreak to subsequent global transmission, no respiratory virus other than influenza has occurred."

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: ገብረየሱስ "በኮሮናቫይረስ እንደደረሰው አይነት ወረርሽኝ አላየንም የሚለውን ተመሳሳይ እይታ ገልጸዋል።"
en-mt: "They expressed the same view that we have not seen an epidemic like the one that happened with the coronavirus," Gebreus said.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: ቀጥለውም፣ "እና ከዚህ ቀደም በተመሳሳይ ጊዜ መቆጣጠር የሚቻል ወረርሽኝ በጭራሽ አይተንም አናውቅም" ብለዋል።
en-mt: He continued, "And we've never seen an outbreak that could be controlled at the same time before."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: አዲሱ ሁኔታ እንደ ወረርሽን ለአለም አቀፍ ስጋት ስርጭቱን የህዝብ ጤና ድንገተኛ ብሎ ለመጠራት የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ውሳኔን ተከትሏል።
en-mt: The new status follows the World Health Organization's decision to declare the spread of the pandemic a public health emergency.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: የአሜርካዉ የብሄራዊ አለርጂና የተላላፊ በሽታዎች ተቋም ዳሬክተር ዶ/ር አንቶኒ ፈዉሲ “የበሽታዉ ስርጭት መህበረሰቡ ውስጥ ጠልቆ ስላገባ በጣም ከባድ እየሆና ነዉ” ብሏል።
en-mt: Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the US National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said: "The spread of the disease is becoming more difficult because it is deeply embedded in the community."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: ከሀሙስ ጀምሮ፣ አሶሼትድ ፕሬስ (Associated Press) በአለም ዙሪያ 126,000 የሚሆኑ የ COVID-19 ኬዞች ሲኖሩ፣ እና በዚህ ምክንያት ከ 4,600 በላይ ሞቶችን መኖራቸውን ዘግቧል።
en-mt: As of Thursday, the Associated Press reported 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, and more than 4,600 deaths.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: የ 2019–20 የኮሮኖቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ እየተስፋፋ ያለዉ የ2019 (COVID-19) የኮሮኖቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ ሲሆን የሚመጣዉም ከባድ በሆነው የመተንፈሻ ኮሮኖቫይረስ 2 (SARS-CoV-2) ነዉ።
en-mt: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is the ongoing 2019 (COVID-19) coronavirus pandemic, caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: ወረርሺኙ የታወቀው በኋን፣ ቻይና፣ ዲሴምበር 2019፣ ጃንዋሪ 30∕2020 ለህዝብ የጤና ድንገተኛ አለም አቀፋዊ ስጋት መሆኑን አስታወቀ፣ በ ማርች 11∕2020 እንደ ወረርሽኝ ታወቀ።
en-mt: The outbreak was identified in Yuan, China, December 2019, declared a public health emergency of global concern on January 30∕2020, and declared an epidemic on March 11∕2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: ኤፕሪል 10∕2020፣ በ 210 ሀገሮች ውስጥ በግምት 1.61 ሚሊየን የሚሆኑ የ COVID-19 ጉዳዮች ተዘግበዋል፣ በግምት ወደ 97,000 የሚሆን ሞቶች ምክንያትም ሆኗል።
en-mt: As of April 10∕2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: ወደ የሚጠጉ 364,000 ሰዎች አገግመዋል።
en-mt: About 364,000 people have recovered.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: ይህ የኬዝ ሞት መጠን በቻይና 4% እንደሆነ ሲገመት፣ በተቀረው የአለም ክፍል ደግሞ በአልጄሪያ 13.04% እስከ ኒውዚላንድ .08% እንደሚሆን ተገምቷል።
en-mt: This case fatality rate is estimated to be 4% in China, and in the rest of the world it is estimated to be 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: ትኩሳት፣ ሳል እና የመተንፈስ ችግር (እጥረት) ዋናኛ ምልክቶቹ ናቸው።
en-mt: Fever, cough and shortness of breath are the main symptoms.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: መወሳሰቦች ኒውሞኒያ እና አጣዳፊ የሆነ የመተንፈስ ጭንቀት ሲንድሮምን ያካትታሉ።
en-mt: Complications include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: ከተጋላጭነት ጀምሮ እስከ የበሽታው ምልክቶች እስከሚታዩ ድረስ ያለው ጊዜ በተለምዶ ወደ አምስት ቀናት ነው፣ ሆኖም ይህ ጊዜ ከሁለት እስከ አስራ አራት ቀናት ድረስ ሊሆን ይችላል።
en-mt: The time from exposure to the onset of symptoms is typically about five days, but this time can be anywhere from two to fourteen days.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: የሚታወቅ ክትባት ወይም ለዚህ የተዘጋጀ ፀረ-ቫይረስ ህክምና የለም።
en-mt: There is no known vaccine or antiviral treatment for this.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
