sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: የዓለም ጤና ድርጅት ድንገተኛ አደጋ ፕሮግራሞች ዋና ሥራ አስፈፃሚ ማይክ ራያን በሰጡት መግለጫ “ይህ በአለም ላይ ለሚገኙት እያንዳንዱ መንግሥት እውነተኛ ምርመራ ነው።
en-mt: "This is a real test for every government in the world," Mike Ryan, executive director of WHO's emergency programmes, said in a statement.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: ይህ ቫይረስ እየመጣ ሊሆን የሚችል ሲሆን እርስዎም ዝግጁ መሆን ያስፈልግዎታል፣ “ ትክክለኛ የመከላከል እርምጃዎችን እንዲወሰዱ መደረጉ አለማችን “የከፋውን” ማለፍ እንድትችል ያደርጋታል።
en-mt: This virus may be coming and you need to be prepared, "Taking the right preventative measures will help our world weather the 'worst'."

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan አክለውም እንደገለፁት የአሁኑ ውሂብ የማህበረሰብ ጤና ባለስልጣናት እንደዚህ አይነት አዋጅ ማለት "በፕላኔት ላይ ያሉት ሁሉም የሰው ልጆች ለቫይረሱ ተጋላጭ እንደሚሆኑ አምነን ተቀብለናል" ብለው የአለም አቀፍ ወረርሽን እንዲደነግጉ ዋስትና አልሰጣቸውም።
en-mt: Ryan added that current data doesn't warrant public health officials declaring such a declaration "an acceptance that every human being on the planet will be vulnerable to the virus" to declare a global pandemic.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: WHO ኮሮኖ ቫይረስን አለም አቀፍ ወረርሽ ነዉ ብሎ ያወጀው መጋቢት 11 ነዉ።
en-mt: WHO declared the corona virus as a global pandemic on March 11.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: ዋና-ዳይሬክተሩ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት "የስርጭት እና አስከፊነቱ አሳሳቢ ደረጃዎች እና እርምጃ ያለመውሰድ አሳሳቢ ደረጃዎች የተነሳ በጣም እንዳሳሳበው" ተናግረዋል። የአለም ጤና ድርጅት የማህበረሰብ ጤና ድንገተኛ አዋጅ ዘግየቶ በማወጅ እና ቫይረሱን አለም አቀፍ ወረርሽኝ ብሎ ለመጥራት መዘግየት ጨምሮ ወረርሽኙን በተመለከተ በቂ የሆነ ቁጥጥር አላደረገም በሚል ከፍተኛ የሆነ ትችት ደርሶበታል።
en-mt: The director-general said the World Health Organization was "deeply concerned by the alarming levels of spread and severity and the alarming levels of inaction". The World Health Organization has been widely criticized for not doing enough to control the outbreak, including a delay in declaring a public health emergency and a delay in declaring the virus a global pandemic.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: ተቃውሞው የአለም ጤና ድርጅት ዋና-ዳይሬክተር የሆኑት ቴዎድሮስ አድሃኖም ስራቸውን እንዲለቁ ፊርማ ተሰብስቧል፣ በዚህም እስከ ሚያዝያ 6 ባለው ጊዜ 733,000 ሰዎች ፈርመዋል።
en-mt: The protest gathered signatures calling for the resignation of WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, with 733,000 signatures as of April 6.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: መጋቢት 26∕2020 ብዙ የ ተ.መ. ድ ሰብዓዊ መብት ባለሞያዎች በዚህ COVID-19 ወረርሽኝ ወክት የአንድም ሰዉ መብት እንዳይጣስ ተኩረት ሰጥተዋል።
en-mt: March 26∕2020 Human rights experts have focused on ensuring that no one's rights are violated during this COVID-19 pandemic.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: ባለሙያዎች እንደገለጹት ሁሉም ሰዉ ህይዎትን ለማዳን መረባረብ እና መንግስት ደግሞ ይህን የመምራት ሀላፍነት አለበት።
en-mt: According to experts, everyone should rush to save your life and the government should be responsible for this.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: ቡድኑ እንደጠቆመዉ የሀብት ወይም የጤና ማድን እጥረት በተወሳነ ቡድን ላይ ጥቃት ለመፈፀም ጥቅም ላይ መዋል የለበትም።
en-mt: As the group suggested, lack of resources or health insurance should not be used to attack a particular group.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: እያንዳንዱ ሰው፣ አካል ጉዳተኞችን፣ አናሳ ቡድን ውሰጥ ያሉትን፣ አዛውንትን፣ የሃገር ውስጥ ተፈናቃዮችን፣ ቤት አልባ የሆኑትን፣ በከባድ ድህነት ሁኔታዎች ውስጥ ያሉትን፣ በእስር ላይ ያሉትን፣ እንዲሁም ደግሞ ስደተኞች እና የመንግስት ድጋፍ የሚያስፈልጋቸው ሌሎች ያልተገለፁ ቡድኖችን ጨምሮ የጤና መብት እንዳቸው ባለሙያዎች አፅንኦትን ይሰጣሉ።
en-mt: Professionals emphasize that everyone has a right to health, including people with disabilities, marginalized groups, the elderly, internally displaced people, the homeless, those in extreme poverty, those in prison, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: የዓላማቀፍ መንግስታዊ ድርጂቶች COVID-19 ያደረሳዉን ምጣኔዊ እና መህበራዊ ችግሮችን ለመፍታት እያተረባረቡ ነዉ።
en-mt: International governmental organizations are working to solve the economic and social problems caused by COVID-19.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: የኢኮኖሚ ትብብር እና እድገት ድርጅት በመላው አለም ላይ ባሉ ሀገራት ላይ ጊዜውን የጠበቀ እና ሁሉን አቀፍ የሆነ የፖሊሲ ምላሾችን የሚሰጥ እንዲሁም አስተያየቶችን እና ምክሮችን የሚሰጥ ስፍራን አዘጋጅቷል።
en-mt: The Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development provides a forum for providing timely and comprehensive policy responses, comments and recommendations to countries around the world.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: የመዘጋቱን ውጤቶች እና የጉዞ ገደቦች የሚያመቱትን ችግሮች ለመፍታት፣ የሃገር ፖሊሲ መከታተያ ጨምሮ የዲጂታል ሃብ ለመፍታት እና ለኮሮና ቫይረስ ተግባራት ምለሽ ለመስጠት ሀገራት እርስ በእርስ መማር እንዲችሉ ለማድረግ እና የተቀናጀ የአለም አቀፍ ምላሽ ለማመቻቸት በፖሊሲዎች የጤና ስርዓቶችን እና የአለም ኢኮኖሚ ማጠናከር።
en-mt: Strengthening health systems and the global economy through policies to address the effects of the lockdown and travel restrictions, a digital hub including country policy tracking, and to enable countries to learn from each other and facilitate a coordinated global response to the coronavirus response.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: ከዩናይትድ ስቴትሰ የዩ ኬ ከቢኔ የሆኑ ሚሼል ጎቭ፣ የብራዚሉ ፕሬዝዳንት ጃር ቦርሰናሮ ልጅ ኤዷርዶ ቦርሰናሮ በቻይና መንግስት ላይ ወቀሳ ደርሰዋል ምከኒያቱም ቫይረሱ የተነሳዉ ከቻይና ሁቤ ግዛት ስለሆነ እና ቻይና ቫይረሱን የያዘችባት ሁኔታ ነዉ።
en-mt: Michelle Gove from the United States, UK and Bene, Eduardo Borsenaro, the son of the Brazilian president, Jared Borsenaro, criticized the Chinese government because the virus originated from China's Hubei province, and the situation where China contained the virus.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: በማዕከላዊ ቻይና ውስጥ የተወሰኑ የክልል-ደረጃ አስተዳዳሪዎች (CPC) አስተዳዳሪዎች ማዕከላዊ ቻይናን በለይቶ ማቆያ ጥረቶችን በመቆጣጠር ምክንያት ተባረዋል፣ በእነዚያ ክልሎች ለተፈጠረው ወረርሽኝ የፖለቲካ ተቋሙ የሰጠው ምላሽ ቅሬታ የፈጠረ ስለመሆኑምልክት ነው።
en-mt: In central China, some provincial-level Communist Party (CPC) administrators have been fired for overseeing quarantine efforts in central China, a sign that the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions has created resentment.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: አንዳንድ ሐተታ ሰጪዎች ይህ እርምጃ የተወሰደው የኮሮና ቫይረስ ስርጭትን በተመለከተ በቻይና ኮሚኒስት ፓርቲ ጄነራል ዋና ፀሃፊ Xi Jinping ላይ የህዝብ ቁጣን ለመከላከል ነው ብለው ያምናሉ።
en-mt: Some commentators believe the move was taken to prevent public anger against Chinese Communist Party General Secretary Xi Jinping over the spread of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: አንዳንድ የቻይና ባለስልጣናት፣ ለምሳሌ፡- Zhao Lijian COVID-19 ከዩ.ኤስ ወይም ጣልያን ሳይነሳ አይቀርም የሚባለው ድብቅ አጀንጃ በመደገፍ፣ የመጀመሪያው የኮሮና ቫይረስ ስርጭት ከውሃን መጀመሩን አይቀበሉም።
en-mt: Some Chinese officials, such as Zhao Lijian, deny that the first outbreak of the novel coronavirus originated in China, advocating a covert agenda that says COVID-19 may not have originated in the U.S. or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: የቻይና "ያላጣሩት ቫይረስ ወደ አለምአቀፋዊ ወረርሽኝ እንዲቀየር አርጎታል" በማለት የአሜሪካው ዶናልድ ትራም አስተዳደር ኮሮናቫይረስን እንደ "የቻይና ቫይረስ" ወይም "የዉሃን ቫይረስ" በማለት ጠቅሰውታል፣ በምላሹ በአንዳንድ ተቺዎች እንደ ዘረኛነት እና "የእሱ አስተዳደር በሽታውን ለመቆጣጠር ባለመቻሉ" ነው ሲሉ ተችተዋል።
en-mt: China's "unfiltered virus allowed it to turn into a global pandemic," the US Donald Trump administration has referred to the coronavirus as the "Chinese virus" or the "Wuhan virus," in response to what some critics call racism and "his administration's failure to control the disease."

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: The Daily Beast በአሜርካ በዘመናዊ ኮሙንኬሽን ውስጥ የተጠቃለሉ ህይወት የለቸዉ ነገሮች ምንጭ በብሄራዊ ደህንነት ምክር ቤት ውስጥ እንደ የኮሙኒኬሽን ስልት የሚነሳ ሁሉ ስላ ቻይና ብቻ ነው።
en-mt: The Daily Beast, the source of the most inanimate objects in modern communications in the United States, is the only one that comes up in the National Security Council as a communications strategy.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: የጋዜጣዊ መግለጫ እና የቴሌቪዥን ዝግጅቶችን ጨምሮ፣ ይህንን መልእክት በተቻለ መጠን በማንኛውም መንገድ እንድንሰራ ተነግሮናል። እንደ ፖለቲኮ፣ የውጭ ፖሊሲ እና ብሉበርግ ያሉ የውጭ ሀገሮች ቻይና በቫይረሱ ለተጠቁ አገራት ርዳታ ለመላክ የምታደርገው ጥረት በዓለም አቀፍ ተጽዕኖ የፕሮፓጋንዳ ግፊት አካል ነው ሲሉ ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: We are told to carry this message in any way possible, including press releases and television appearances. Outsiders such as Politico, Foreign Policy and Bloomberg have said China's efforts to send aid to countries affected by the virus are part of a propaganda push by global influence.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: የአውሮፓ ሕብረት ዉጭ ፖሊሲ ሀላፊ የሆኑት ጆሴፍ ቦሪሊ እንዳስጠነቀቁት “በአዙሪት እና የበጎነት ፖሊቲካ በሚል የጂኦፖሎቲክስ ተፅዕኖ ለማድረግ እሽቅድድሞሽ እንዳለ ነዉ።”
en-mt: European Union foreign policy chief Joseph Borrelli warned that "there is a race for geopolitical influence through spin and virtue politics."

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrell "ቻይና ከአሜሪካ በተለየ ሀላፊነት ያለውና አስተማማኝ አጋር እንደሆነ መልዕክቱን በጥብቅ እያሰራጨች ነው።" ሲል ተናግሯል።
en-mt: "China is sending a strong message that it is a responsible and reliable partner, unlike the US," Borrell said. he said.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: ቸይና ከሶሪያ፣ ከቬኒዙዌላ፣ እና ከኢራን ማዕቀቧን እንድታናሳ ለአሜርካ ጥሪ በማቅረብ በተደጋጋሚ ለቬኒዙዌላ፣ እና ለኢራን ዕርዳታ አድርጋለች።
en-mt: China has repeatedly offered aid to Venezuela and Iran, calling on the US to ease sanctions on Syria, Venezuela, and Iran.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Jack Ma ለኩባ የለገሱት 100,000 ጭምብሎች በሚያዝያ 3 በዩኤስ ማዕቀቦች ታግዷል።
en-mt: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: የአሜሪካ ባለስልጣናት ለሌሎች ሃገራት እንዲሰጥ የታሰበ የእርዳታ ገንዘብን ለራሳቸው ሃገር በማዋል ተወቅሰዋል።
en-mt: US officials have been criticized for diverting aid money intended for other countries to their own countries.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: ከፊት እና አፊንጫ መሸፈኛ ጋር በተገናኛ በጀርመን፣ ኦስቲሪያ፣ ስዊዘርላንድ፣ ቼክ ሪፓብሊክ እና ጣሊያን መካከል አለመግባባት እደነበራ ነዉ የተሰማ።
en-mt: It is understood that there is disagreement between Germany, Austria, Switzerland, the Czech Republic and Italy in relation to face and nose coverings.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: በተጨማሪም ቱርክ ወደ ስፔን እየተጓጓዙ የነበሩ በመቶዎች የሚቆጠሩ የመተንፈሻ መሳሪያዎችን ተቆጣጠረች።
en-mt: Turkey also seized hundreds of ventilators being shipped to Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: በመጀመሪያዎቹ ማርች ላይ፣ የአውሮፓ ህብረት በኮሮና ቫይረስ ከተጠቃችው ጣሊያን ጋር የትብብር ማነስን የጣሊያን መንግስት ተችታለች።
en-mt: In early March, the European Union criticized the Italian government for its lack of cooperation with Italy, which has been hit by the coronavirus.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: በአውሮፓ ሕብረት የጣሊያን አምባሳደር፣ Maurizio Massari፣ "ሁለትዮሽ ምላሽ የሰጠችው ቻይና ብቻ ናት" ብለዋል።
en-mt: Italy's ambassador to the European Union, Maurizio Massari, said that "only China has responded bilaterally."

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: በእርግጥ ይህ ለአዉሮፓዉያን አብሮነት ጥሩ ምሳሌ አይደላም።”
en-mt: This is certainly not a good example of European solidarity."

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: መጋቢት 22 ላይ ሩሲየዉ ፕሬዚዳንት ቪላድሚር ፑትን ከጣሊያኑ ጠቅላይ ሚኒሰትር ጁሴፔ ኮንቴ ጋር በስልክ ከተነጋገሩ በኋላ የመከላኪያ ሀኪሞችን፣ የተለያዩ የህክሚና ቁሳቁሶችን፣ መድኀኒት የሚረጩ ተሽከርካሪዎችን ጣሊያን እንድደርሱ ሁኔታን አመቻቹ።
en-mt: On March 22, Russian President Vladimir Putin spoke with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte on the phone and arranged for the arrival of protective doctors, various medical supplies, and vehicles spraying medicine to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: La Stampa የተሰኘው የጣሊያን ጋዜጣ ስሙ እንዳዲገለጽ ያልፈለገ አንድ ከፍተኛ ፖለቲካኛን ዋቢ አድርጎ እንደዘገበው 80 በመቶው የሚሆነው የጣሊያን እርዳታ ምንም ወይንም ብዙ ፋይዳ የለውም።
en-mt: According to the Italian newspaper La Stampa, citing a senior politician who did not wish to be named, 80 percent of Italy's aid is of little or no value.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: ምንጩ ሩሲያንን "በጂዮፖለቲካ እና ዲፕሎማሲዊ" ላይ ውዝግብ አስነሺ በማለት ተችቷል።
en-mt: The source criticized the Russians as "geopolitically and diplomatically" controversial.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: የሎምባርዲይ ፕሬዘዳንት፣ Attilio Fontana ፣ እና የጣልያን የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚንስትር Luigi Di Maio የሚዲያ ሪፖርቶችን በማጣጣል ምስጋናቸውን ገልፀዋል።
en-mt: Lombardy's president, Attilio Fontana, and Italy's foreign minister, Luigi Di Maio, expressed gratitude for discrediting media reports.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: ራሽያም አንድ ካርጎ አዉሮፕለን መድሃኒት ወደ አሜሪካ ልካለች።
en-mt: Russia has sent a cargo plane of medicine to the US.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: የክሬምሊን ቃል አቀባይ Dmitry Peskov "ለዩኤስ አጋሮች ድጋፍ ሲሰጥ፣ [ፑቲን] የዩኤስ የህክምና መሳሪያ እና ማቴሪያሎች አምራቾች ፍጥነት ሲያገኙ፣ አስፈላጊ ከሆነ እንደገና ሊመልሱ ይችላሉ ብለው ገምተዋል" ሲሉ ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said, "While offering support to US partners, [Putin] assumed that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they can reciprocate if necessary."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: ከቀዝቃዛው ጦርነት ማብቂያ ጀምሮ ትልቁ የ NATO ጦርነት እንቅስቃሴ በጀርመን፣ በፖላንድ እና በባልቲክ ግዛቶች የታቀደው ኔቶ “ዲፌንደር 2020” ወታደራዊ ልምምድ በዝቅተኛ ደረጃ ይካሄዳል።
en-mt: NATO's "Defender 2020" military exercise, planned for Germany, Poland and the Baltic states, will take place on a low-key basis, the largest NATO military exercise since the end of the Cold War.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: ለኑክሌር የጦር መሳሪያ ትጥቅ የመፍታት ቅስቀሳ ዋና ጸሐፊ Kate Hudson የ ዲፌንደር 2020 ልምምዶችን ተችተዋል።"በአሁኑ ወቅት ባለው የህዝብ-ጤና ቀውስ ውስጥ፣ ከአሜሪካ የመጡ የወታደሮች እና ብዙ ከአውሮፓ ሃገሮች የተሳተፉትን ህይወት ብቻ ሳይሆን ነገር ግን የሚሰሩባቸው አገራት ነዋሪዎች ህይወትንም አደጋ ላይ ይጥላል።" የኢራን መንግስት በቫይረሱ በእጅጉ ተጠቅቷል፣ ወደ ሁለት ደርዘን የፓርላማ አባላቶች የተጠቁ ሲሆኑ እንዲሁም አስራ አምስት የአሁን ወይም የቀድሞ የፖለቲካ ሰዎች ተጠቅተዋል።
en-mt: Kate Hudson, secretary-general of the Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament, criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it puts at risk not only the lives of American soldiers and many from European countries involved, but also the lives of the citizens of the countries where they serve." The Iranian government has been hit hard by the virus, with about two dozen members of parliament infected, as well as fifteen current or former political figures.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: መጋቢት 14፣ 2020 የኢራኑ ፕሬዝዳንት ሀሰን ሮሐኒ ወረርሽኙን ለመከላከል የሚያደርጉት ጥረት ውጤታማ እንዳይሁን አሜሪካ በሀገራቸው ላይ የጣለችባቸው የኢኮኖሚ ማዕቀብ ትልቅ እንቅፋት እንደሆነባቸው በመግለጽ ለአለም መንግስታት የድረሱልኝ ይፋዊ ደብዳቤ ጽፈዋል። ወረርሽኙ አሜሪካ ከሌሎች መሰል የበለጸጉ ሀገራት (አለማቀፍ የጤና ጥበቃ፤ አለማቀፍ የህጻናት ጥበቃ፤ ለህረተሰብ ጤና ከፍተኛ በጀት ወዘተ) ጋር አብሮ የሚሄድ ፈጣን ማህበራዊ ፖሊሲ ተግባራዊ እንድታደረግ አድርጓታል።
en-mt: On March 14, 2020, Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote an official letter to the governments of the world, stating that the economic sanctions imposed by the United States on his country are a major obstacle to their efforts to prevent the epidemic. The epidemic has led the US to implement a rapid social policy in line with other similar developed countries (international health protection, international child protection, high budget for public health, etc.).

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: የፖለቲካ ተንኝታኞች ይህ ነገር ዶናልድ ትራምፕ በ 2020 የፕሬዘዳንታዊ ምርጫ ላይ በድጋሚ-የመመረጥ እድሎቹን በአሉታዊ መልኩ ተፅዕኖ ሊያሳድርበት እንደሚችል ገምተዋል። ከጃፓን እና ደቡብ ኮሪያ ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነቶች በወረርሽኙ የተነሳ ሻክረዋል።
en-mt: Political analysts speculate that this could negatively affect Donald Trump's re-election chances in the 2020 presidential election. Diplomatic relations with Japan and South Korea have been strained by the outbreak.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: ጃፓን "ማንኛዉም ከደቡብ ኮሪያ የሚመጣ ሰዉ መንግስት ባዘጋጀዉ ማቆያ ቦታ ለሁለት ሳምንታት ይቆያል" ብላ ካሳወቀች በኋላ ደቡብ ኮሪያ "ግልፅ ያልሆና እና ደካማ ዉሳኔ በማለት ጃፓንን ወቀሰች።
en-mt: After Japan announced that "any person arriving from South Korea will be held in a detention center set up by the government for two weeks," South Korea criticized Japan for its "unclear and weak decision."

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: ፕሬዚዳንት Moon Jae-in ለቀውሱ ምላሽ ለመስጠት በወሰዱት እርምጃ የደቡብ ኮሪያ ማህበረሰቦች መጀመሪያ ላይ እንቅስቃሴያቸው እጅግ ተገድቦ ነበር።
en-mt: South Korean communities were initially heavily restricted in their response to the crisis by President Moon Jae-in.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: ብዙ ኮሪያውያን በመንግስት በተሳሳተ መንገድ ወረርሽኙ እየተባባሰ ነው ከላይ ያለው ጨረቃ እንዲቀጣ በማለት አቤቱታቸውን እየፈረሙ ነው፣ ወይም ምላሹን እያወደሱት ነው። ወረርሽኙ ሀገሮች በምላሹ የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ አዋጅ እንዲያስተላልፉ አድርጓል።
en-mt: Many Koreans are signing petitions calling for the moon to be punished for the government's mishandling of the epidemic, or praising its response. The outbreak has prompted countries to declare states of emergency in response.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: አንዳንድ ተንታኞች መንግስታት ስልጣናቸውን እንዲያጠናክሩ ሊረዳቸው እንደሚችል ስጋታቸውን ገልጸዋል።
en-mt: Some analysts fear it could help governments consolidate power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: በሃንጋሪ፣ ፓርላማው ጠቅላይ ሚንስትር Viktor OrbÃ¡n ባልተወሰነ ሁኔታ በድንጋጌው መሰረት እንዲመሩ፣ ፓርላማ እለጊዜው እንዲያግዱ እንዲሁም ደግሞ ምርጫዎችን እንዲያግዱ እና ስለ ቫይረሱ እና መንግስት ቀውሱን ለመቆጣጠር እያደረግ ባለው ነገር ላይ የሀሰት መረጃ በሚያሰራጩ ሰዎች ላይ እርምጃ እንዲወስዱ ፈቅዶላቸዋል።
en-mt: In Hungary, parliament has allowed Prime Minister Viktor Orbán to lead indefinitely by decree, temporarily suspending parliament and elections and cracking down on people spreading false information about the virus and what the government is doing to manage the crisis.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: የኮሮና ቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ በብዙ የአቅርቦቶች እጥረት፣ የበሽታውን ወረርሽኝ ለመዋጋት በዓለም አቀፍ ደረጃ እየጨመረ የመጣዉን አጠቃቀም፣ የድንጋጤ ግዢ፣ እና በፋብሪካ እና በሎጂስቲክ ስራዎች ላይ መቋረጥን ማስከተል የተነሳ ተወቃሽ ሆኗል።
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for widespread supply shortages, increased spending worldwide to combat the pandemic, panic buying, and disruptions to factory and logistics operations.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: የዩናይትድ ስቴትስ የምግብና መድሃኒት አስተዳደር የተጠቃሚ ፍላጎት በመጨመሩ እና የአቅራቢ መስተጓጎል በመፈጠሩ ሳቢያ የመድሃኒቶች እና የህክምና መሳሪያ እጥረቶች ሊከሰቱ እንደሚችሉ ማስጠንቀቂያን ሰጥቷል።
en-mt: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has warned that drug and medical device shortages could occur due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruptions.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: በርካታ የአካባቢው ሰዎች መሰረታዊ ፍላጎቶች እንደ ምግብ፣ የመፀዳጃ ቤት ወረቀት/ሶፍት፣ እና የታሸገ ውሃ የያዙ መደርደሪዎች በድንጋጤ ሸመታ ባዶ በመሆቸው፣ የአቅርቦት እጥረቶች መከሰታቸውን ታዝበዋል።
en-mt: Many local residents have observed shortages of basic necessities such as food, toilet paper/soft, and bottled water as shelves containing them have been left empty due to panic shopping.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: የቴክኖሎጂው ኢንዱስትሪ በተለይም የኤሌክትሪክ እቃዎችን መጓጓዝ ላይ መዘግየት ሊፈጠር እንደሚችል አስጠንቅቋል።
en-mt: The technology industry, in particular, has warned that there could be delays in the shipment of electrical goods.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: የ WHO ዋና ዳይሬክተር ቴድሮስ አድሃኖም እንደተናገሩት፣ የግል ደህንነት መጠበቂያ መሳሪያዎች ፍላጎት በ 100-እጥፍ አድጓል።
en-mt: According to WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, demand for personal protective equipment has grown 100-fold.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: ይህ ፍላጎት ከመደበኛ ዋጋ በሀያ እጥፍ የዋጋን ጭማሪ እንዲያስከትል እና የህክምና እቃዎች ከአራት እስከ ስድስት ወሮች እንዲዘገዩ አድርጓል።
en-mt: This demand has caused prices to increase by twenty times the normal price and medical supplies to be delayed by four to six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: በአለም ዙሪያ የግል ደህንነት መጠበቂያ መሳሪያ እጥረትን አስከትሏል፣ በዚህም የጤና ሰራተኞች አደጋ ላይ ሊወድቁ እንደሚችሉ የአለም ጤና ድርጅት አስጠንቅቋል።
en-mt: It has led to a worldwide shortage of personal protective equipment, putting health workers at risk, the World Health Organization has warned.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: አውስትራሊያ ውስጥ፣ አለም አቀፉ ወረርሽኝ የዳይጉ ሸማቾች የአውስትራሊያ ምርቶችን ለቻይና ይሸጡ ዘንድ አዲስ አጋጣሚ ፈጥሮላቸዋል።
en-mt: In Australia, the global pandemic has created a new opportunity for Daigo consumers to sell Australian products to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: ድርጊቱ በአንድ አንድ ሱፐር ማርኬቶች ዉስጥ የሕፃናት ፎርሙላ እጥረት አጋጥል፤ ከዚያ በኋላ በአዉስትራሊያ መንግስት እንዲወጋድተደረገ። ምንም እንኳ የCOVID-19 ኬዞች ስርጭት በሰሜን ኢጣሊያ እና ዉሃን ክልል ከፍተኛ ብሆንም ከፊተኛ ምግብ ፊላጎትን በመከታታል ሁለቱም አከባቢዎች ከምግብ እጥረት ድኖዋል።
en-mt: The action caused a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets. It was later banned by the Australian government. Although the prevalence of COVID-19 cases is highest in northern Italy and the Wuhan region, both regions have been spared food shortages by following the First Food Philagote.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: በጣም ወሳኝ የሆኑ ምርቶች ክምችት እና የተከለከለ ንግድን ለማስቀረት በቻይና እና ጣልያን የተወሰዱት እርምጃዎች ውጤታማ ነበሩ፣ እነዚህም እርምጃዎች በአውሮፓ እና ሰሜን አሜሪካ የተጋረጡትን አሳሳቢ የምግብ እጥረቶችን ማስቀረት ችለዋል።
en-mt: Measures taken by China and Italy to prevent stockpiling and restricted trade of critical commodities have been effective, and these measures have averted the serious food shortages faced by Europe and North America.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: ሰሜን ኢጣሊያ ትልልቅ የግብርና ምርት ስላላት ትልቅ የሚባል ቅናሽ አላሳየችም፤ ነገር ግን የኢንዱስትሪ ተወካዮች እንደ አሉት ከሆነ ዋጋ ልጨምር ይችላል።
en-mt: Northern Italy does not show a significant decline as it has large agricultural production. But if the industry representatives have it, I may increase the price.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: ባዶ የምግብ መደርደሪያዎች ለጊዜው ብቻ ሊከሰት ይችላል፣ ይህም በውሃን ከተማ ውስጥ እራሱ፣ የቻይና መንግስት ባለስልጣናት ለህዝብ በቂ የምግብ ክምችት መኖሩን ለማረጋገጥ የአሳማ ስጋ ክምችት ለቋል።
en-mt: Empty food shelves can only happen temporarily, as in Wenzhou itself, Chinese government officials released pork stocks to ensure adequate food supplies for the public.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: በጣሊያንም ምግብ አምራቾች ለእንደነዚህ አይነት የአደጋ ችግር ጊዜ መጠባበቂያ እንዲያስቀምጡ የሚደነግግ ተመሳሳይ ህግ አለ።
en-mt: In Italy, there is a similar law requiring food producers to set aside reserves for such emergencies.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: በአለም አቀፍ ኢኮኖሚ ላይ የደረሰው ጉዳት በቻይና ውስጥም ታይቷል፡ በመጋቢት 16 ሚዲያ ሪፖርት መሰረት፣ በ 2020 የመጀመሪያዎቹ ሁለት ወራት ወቅት የቫይረስ ስርጭት ለመቀነስ መንግስት በወሰዳቸው እርምጃዎች መሰረት የቻይና ኢኮኖሚ በጣም ጎድቷል እና የችርቻሮ ሽያጮች በ 20.5% ቀንሷል።
en-mt: The damage to the global economy was also seen in China: according to a March 16 media report, China's economy was hit hard by government measures to slow the spread of the virus in the first two months of 2020, with retail sales down 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: ቻይና የምጣኔ ህብት እና ማኑፈክቸርንግ ማዕከል በመሆኗ እና ቫይረሱ ከዛ በመነሳቱ በአለም ምጣኔ ህብት መዋዠቅ ተከስቷል።
en-mt: Because China is the center of economy and manufacturing and the virus started from there, fluctuations in the world economy happened.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit ይበልጥ ግልጽ የሚሆኑ ውጤቶች እስኪወጡ ድረስ ገበያዎች ተለዋዋጭ እንደሆኑ ይቀጥላሉ።
en-mt: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit Markets will remain volatile until clearer results emerge.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: በጃንዋሪ 2020፣ አንዳንድ ተንታኞች በግምት በዓለም ላይ እድገት ወረርሽኙ የሚያሳድረው ኢኮኖሚያዊ ውድቀት ከ 2002-2004 ከ SARS ወረርሽኝ የበለጠ ሊሆን እንደሚችል ገምተዋል።
en-mt: As of January 2020, some analysts estimate that the economic fallout from the pandemic to global growth could be greater than that of the 2002-2004 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: በ St. Louis Washington University የሚሰሩት ኤክስፐርት ባስቀመጡት ግምት መሰረት፣ የአለም አቅርቦት ሰንሰለት እሰከ ሁለት አመት ሊቆይ የሚችል ከ $300 ቢሊዮን በላይ ጫና ያርፍበታል።
en-mt: In St. According to estimates by experts working at Louis Washington University, the global supply chain will be under pressure of more than $300 billion in the next two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: የቻይና የነዳጅ ፍላጎት እና የነዳጅ ዋጋ በማሽቆልቆሉ የነዳጅ ላኪ ሀገራት ድርጅት (OPEC) ገበያ ለመፈለግ ሲራኮት እንደነበር ተዘግቧል።
en-mt: It has been reported that the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has been scrambling to find a market due to China's oil demand and falling oil prices.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: በ 24 ፌብሩዋሪ ላይ ከሜይንላንድ ቻይና ውጪ በ COVID-19 ጉዳዮች ከፍተኛ መጨመር ምክንያት የአለም አቀፍ የስቶክ ገበያዎች ወድቀዋል።
en-mt: Global stock markets fell on February 24 due to a sharp rise in COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: እ.አ.አ በየካቲት 27፣ በኮሮናቫይረስ ስርጭት የተስፋፋቱት ስጋቶች ሳቢያ፣ NASDAQ-100፣ the S&P 500 Index፣ እና the Dow Jones Industrial Average ጨምሮ በርካታ የዩ.ኤስ ሸቀጥ ጠቋሚዎች ከ 2008 ጀምሮ በጣም ያሽቆለቆለባቸውን የለጠፉ ሲሆን ከዚህም ነጥቦችን ቀንሷል፤ ይህም ከ 2007-08 ጀምሮ ከመጣው የፋይናንስ ቀውስ ከፍተኛው የአንድ-ቀን ውድቀት ነው።
en-mt: On February 27, several U.S. stock indexes, including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average, posted their worst declines since 2008 and shed points due to widespread concerns over the spread of the coronavirus; This is the biggest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007-08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: ሶስቱም ማውጫዎች ከ 10% በላይ በመቀነስ ሳምንቱን አጠናቅቀዋል።
en-mt: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: በየካቲት 28 Scope Ratings GmbH ቻይና ብድርን በተመለከተ በራሷ መወሰን የምትችል ነጻ ሀገር መሆኗን አረጋግጧል። ይሁን እና አሉታዊ ተጽዕኖ አሳድሮባቸዋል።
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH confirmed that China is an independent country that can make its own credit decisions. However, they were negatively affected.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: አክሲዮኖች እንደገና በኮሮና ቫይረስ ስጋት ምክንያት ዋጋው የወደቀ ሲሆን ትልቅ የሆነው ውድቀት በማርች 16 ተመዝግቧል።
en-mt: Stocks fell again due to the threat of the corona virus, and the biggest fall was recorded on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: የኢኮኖሚ ውድቀት ሊፈጠር እንደሚችል በርካቶች ይገምታሉ።
en-mt: Many are predicting a recession.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: ኢኮኖሚስቱ Mohamed El-Erian ማዕከላዊ ባኮች እና ስቴቶች ስለወሰዱት የጊዜያዊ የአስቸኳይ ጊዜ እርምጃዎችን አመስግነዋል።
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised the central banks and states for the temporary emergency measures.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: ማዕከላዊ ባንኮች እ.ኤ.አ በ 2008 ከገቡበት የፋይናንስ ቀውስ ለመውጣት ካደረጉት ይልቅ በፍጥነት ምላሽ እየሰጡ ይገኛሉ።
en-mt: Central banks are responding faster than they did to get out of the 2008 financial crisis.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: በጉዞ እገዳዎች፣ የጉዞ መስህቦችን ጨምሮ የህዝብ ቦታዎች በመዘጋታቸው፣ እና መንግስታት በመላው አለም የሚደረግ ማንኛውም ጉዞ እንዲቆም በመምከራቸው በጣም ከተጎዱት ዘርፎች መካከል አንዱ ቱሪዝም ነው።
en-mt: Tourism is one of the sectors hardest hit by travel bans, closures of public spaces including tourist attractions, and governments advising a halt to all travel around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: በዚህ ምክንያት ብሪታንያ አየር መንገድ፣ ቻይና ምስራቃዊ አየር መንገድ እና ካንታንስ ጨምሮ በርካታ አየር መንገዶች በዝቅተኛ ፍላጎት ምክንያት በረራዎችን ሰርዘዋል፣ የብሪታንያ የክልል አየር መንገድ ፍሌይም ወድቀዋል።
en-mt: As a result, several airlines, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qatar Airways, canceled flights due to low demand, while British regional airline Flame also collapsed.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: የክሩዝ ላይን ኢንዱስትሪው ላይ የደረሰው ተጽእኖ መጠን ከዚህ በፊት ታይቶ አያውቅም።
en-mt: The scale of the impact on the cruise line industry has never been seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: በርካታ የባቡር ጣቢያዎች እና አመላላሽ ጀልባ ወደቦችም ተዘግተዋል።
en-mt: Several railway stations and ferry ports were also closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: ከቻይና አዲስ አመት በዓል ጋር በተገኛኘ ዋና የጉዞ ምክንያት በሆነው ቹንዩን ውስጥ ወረርሽኙ ተስፋፍቷል።
en-mt: The outbreak has spread in Chunyun, a major travel destination associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: ሰፊ ስብስብን የሚሳትፉ በርካታ ዝግጅቶች፣ የአዲስ አመት ክብረ-በዓላት ጨምሮ በብሄራዊ እና ክልላዊ መንግስታት ተሰርዘዋል፣ የግል ኩባንያዎችም እን መደብሮቻቸውን እና እንደ ሆንግ ኮንግ ዲዝኒላንድ እና ሻንጋይ ዲዝኒ ኒላንድ አይነት የቱሪስት መስህባቸውን እየዘጉ ይገኛሉ።
en-mt: Many large-scale events, including New Year's celebrations, have been canceled by national and regional governments, while private companies are closing their stores and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: በቤጂንግ ዉስጥ በሚገኘዉ ፎርቢደን ሲቲ አና የባህላዊ የካርኒቫል ቤታ መቅደስን ጨሚሮ ብዙ የሉነር አድስ ዓመት በዓለት እና የቱሪስት መስቦች በዙ ሰዎች እንዳይሰባሰቡ ስባል ተዘግተዋል።
en-mt: In the Forbidden City in Beijing, many Lunar New Year rock and tourist attractions, including the traditional carnival Beta Temple, are closed to avoid crowds.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: ቻይና ዉስጥ ከሚገኙ 31 ግዛቶች፣ ከተማ መስተዳደሮች እና ክልሎች በ 24ቱ ዉስጥ አድስ ዘመን በዓል እስከ የካቲት 10 እንዲራዛም እና ቀኑ እስኪደርስ ብዙ ስራ ቦታዎች እንዳይከፈቱ ባለስልጣናት ትእዛዝ አስተላልፈዋል።
en-mt: In 24 of the 31 provinces, municipalities and regions in China, authorities have ordered that the New Year holiday be extended until February 10 and that many workplaces should not be opened until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: እነዚህ ክልሎች 80% የሃገሩን ብሔራዊ የሃገር ውስጥ ምርት እና 90% ኤክስፖርቶችን ይወክላሉ።
en-mt: These regions represent 80% of the country's national domestic product and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: ሆንግ ኮንግ ለተላላፊው በሽታ የምላሽዋን ደረጃ ከፍ አድርጋለች፣ እና ድንገተኛ ብላ በማወጅ፣ ትምህርት ቤቶችን እስከ ማርች ዘግታለች እና የአዲስ አመት በአሎቸን ሰርዛለች። በመደብሮች ሰዓታት መቀነስ እና ጊዜያዊ መዘጋቶች፣ የችርቻሮ ንግድ በአለም ዙሪያ ተጽዕኖ ተፈጥሮባቸዋል።
en-mt: Hong Kong has ramped up its response to the pandemic, declaring a state of emergency, closing schools until March and canceling New Year's Eve. With reduced store hours and temporary closures, retail businesses around the world have been affected.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: በአውሮፓ እና ላቲን አሜሪካ ወዳሉ የችርቻሮ ሻጮች የሚደረግ ጉብኝት በ 40% ቀንሷል።
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America are down 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: የሰሜን ኣፍሪካ እና መካከለኛ ምስራቅ ነጋዴዎች የ50 – 60% ቅናሽ ገጥሟቸዋል።
en-mt: North African and Middle Eastern traders face a 50-60% discount.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: ይህ ደግሞ በማርች የ 33–43% ከፌብሩዋሪ ሲወዳደር ወደ የግዢ ማዕከሎች የሚሄዱት የእግር ትራፊክ ማሽቆልቆልን አምጥቷል።
en-mt: This led to a 33–43% decline in foot traffic to shopping centers in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: በአለም ዙሪያ ያሉ የመገበያያ ሞል ኦፐሬተሮች እንደ ተጨማሪ ንፅህና መጠበቂያ፣ የሸማቾች ሙቀት ለመፈተሽ የሙቀት መፈተሻ ገጠማ፣ እና ዝግጅቶች መሰረዝ አይነት ተጨማሪ እርምጃዎችን ተግብረዋል። በተባበሩት መንግስታት ድርጅት የላቲን አሜሪካ ኢኮኖሚክ ኮሚሽን እንደገመተው፣ የወረርሽን-ተኮር መዘጋት በላቲን አሜሪካ ውስጥ በ 14 እና 22 ሚሊዮን መሃል የሚገመቱ ሰዎችን ያለ ወረርሽኝ ችግር ውስጥ ገብተው ከነበሩ ሰዎች ይልቅ ወደ ከፋ ድህነት ውስጥ ሊከታቸው ይችላል።
en-mt: Mall operators around the world have implemented additional measures such as increased sanitation, temperature probes to check shoppers' temperatures, and canceling events. According to the United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America, pandemic-related lockdowns could push between 14 and 22 million people in Latin America into greater poverty than they would have been without the pandemic.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: ጥር እና የካቲት 2020 ላይ በዉሃን ወረርሽኙ ጣራ በነካ ግዜ 5 ሚሊየን የሚሆኑ ቻይናዉን ስራቸዉን አጥተው ነበር።
en-mt: In January and February 2020, when the epidemic reached its peak in Wuhan, about 5 million Chinese lost their jobs.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: ወደ 300 ሚሊዮን የሚጠጉ በርካታ የቻይና የገጠር ስደተኛ ሰራተኞች በሁቤይ ግዛት ውስጥ ወደመሃል ሃገር ውስጥ በቤት እንዲሆኑ ወይም እንዲቆዩ ተደርገዋል። በመጋቢት 2020፣ ከ 10 ሚሊዮን በላይ አሜሪካውያን ስራቸውን አጥተዋል እናም ለመንግስት እርዳታ አመልክተዋል።
en-mt: An estimated 300 million Chinese rural migrant workers have been sent to stay at home or remain inland in Hubei province. As of March 2020, more than 10 million Americans have lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: የኮሮናቫይረስ ስርጭት በዩናይትድ ስቴተስ ውስጥ 47 ሚሊዮን ስራዎችን አሳጥቷል እና Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis እንደገመተው የስራ አጥነት መጠን 32% ሊደርስ ይችላል። በህንድ ያለው መዘጋት በሚሊዮናች የሚቀጠሩ የህንድ ስደተኛ ሰራተኞችን (በየዕለት ስራ ደሞዞች የሚከፈላቸው) ስራ አጥ አድርጓቿል። የ Angus Reid Institute ዳሰሳ 44% ካናዳውያን ቤተሰቦችበሆነ መልኩ ስራ አጥነት አንደገጠማቸው ደርሶበታል። በስፔን ውስጥ ከእ.ኤ.አ ከመጋቢት 2020 አጋማሽ ጀምሮ ሁሉም ነገር በመዘጋቱ ወደ 900,000 የሚደርሱ ሰራተኞች ስራቸውን አጥተዋል።
en-mt: The spread of the coronavirus has cost 47 million jobs in the United States and the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis estimated the unemployment rate could reach 32%. The shutdown in India has left millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid daily wages) unemployed. An Angus Reid Institute survey found that 44% of Canadian households have not experienced unemployment in some form. Almost 900,000 workers have lost their jobs in Spain since mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: በማርች ሁለተኛ አጋማሽ፣ ለጊዜያዊ የስራ አጥነት ጥቅሞች 4 ሚሊየን የፈረንሳይ ሰራተኞች አመልክተዋል እና 1 ሚሊዮን የእንግሊዝ ሰራተኞች ለአለም አቀፋዊ የብድር ዘዴ አመልክተዋል፣ ወደ ግማሽ ሚሊየን የሚጠጉ የጀርመን ድርጅቶች ሰራተኞቻቸውን Kurzarbeit ተብሎ ለሚጠራው የመንግስት የአጭር ጊዜ የቅነሳ ስራዎች ዘዴ ሰራተኞቻቸውን ልከዋል።
en-mt: In the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for the universal credit scheme, while nearly half a million German firms sent their workers to the government's short-term layoff scheme, known as Kurzarbeit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: በጀርመን ተግባራዊ የተደረገው የአጭር ጊዜ የስራ ካሳ ፖሮግራም በፈረንሳይ አና በእንግሊዝም ተግባራዊ መደረግ ጀምሯል።
en-mt: The short-term work compensation program implemented in Germany has started to be implemented in France and England.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: የኪነ ጥበብ እና ባህላዊ ታሪክ ክፍሎች በዚህ ወረርሽኝን ምክንያት በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ጉዳት የደረሰበት ሲሆን፣ የድርጅቶችን እንቅስቃሴ እንዲሁም የተቀጠሩ እና በአለም አቀፍ ደረጃ በግላቸው የሚሰሩ ግለሰቦችንም ተጽእኖ ውስጥ አስገብተዋል።
en-mt: The art and cultural history sectors have been hit hard by this pandemic, affecting corporate activity as well as employed and self-employed individuals worldwide.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: የጥበብ እና የባህል ዘርፍ ድርጅቶች ባህላዊ ቅርስን ለህብረተሰቡ የማቅረብ ተልዕኮቻቸውን (ብዙውን ጊዜ በመንግስት የሚረዳ)፣ የሰራተኞቻቸውን እና የህዝብን ደህንነት ለመጠበቅ፣ እና በተቻው ሁሉ ተዋናዮችን ለመደገፍ ሞክረዋል።
en-mt: Organizations in the arts and culture sector have tried to fulfill their mission (often supported by the government) of presenting cultural heritage to the public, to protect the safety of their workers and the public, and to support the actors as much as possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: መጋቢት 2020 ስደርስ መጠኑ ይለያይ እንጅ በመለዉ አለም ቤተ መፅሐፍት፣ ሙዚያሞች፣ የትዕይንት መድረኮችና ሌሎች የባህል ተቋማት ተዛገቶ ትዕይንቶችም ተሰሪዛዋል ወይም ለሌላ ግዜ ተላልፈዋል።
en-mt: By the time I reach March 2020, the amount will vary, but libraries, museums, theaters and other cultural institutions around the world have been closed and shows have been canceled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: በምላሹም በዲጂታል መድረክ አማራጭ አገልግሉት ለመስጠት ትልቅ ጥረቶች ነበሩ። ሌላው የቅርብ እና በፍጥነት እያደገ ያለው የዚህ በሽታ ክስተት የሃይማኖታዊ አገልግሎቶች፣ ስፖርት ውስጥ ዋነኛ ክስተቶች፣ እና ሌሎች ማህበራዊ ዝግጅቶች፣ እንደ የሙዚቃ ፌስቲቫሎች እና ኮንሰርቶች፣ የቴክሎኖጂ ኮንፍረንስ እና የፋሽን ትርዒቶች መሰረዝ ነው።
en-mt: In response, there have been major efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Another recent and rapidly growing phenomenon of this disease is the cancellation of religious services, major sporting events, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: የፊልም ኢንዱስትሪውም መቋረጦች አጋጥሞታል። የ ቫቲካን በሮም ውስጥ የቅዱስ ሳምንት በመጨረሻው የክርስቲያኖች penitential የጾም ጊዜ የሚደረግ ስነስርአት፣ መሰረዙን አስታውቀዋል።
en-mt: The film industry also faced disruptions. The Vatican has announced the cancellation of the penitential Lent ceremony at the end of Holy Week in Rome.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: ብዙ የሀገረ ስብከቶች አዛውንት ክርስቲያኖችን እሁድ ቀን ከብዙሀን ጋር መጥተው መሳተፋቸውን በመተው ቤታቸው እንዲቀመጡ መክሯል፤ አንዳንድ ቤተ-እምነቶች የቤተክርስቲያንን አገልግሎቶች በሬድዮ፣ በኦንላይን የቀጥታ ስርጨት ወይም ቴሌቪዥን ተደራሽ ሲያደርጉ፣ ሌሎቹ አምልኮን በመኪና እየነዱ ለማድረግ አቅርበዋል።
en-mt: He advised the elderly Christians of many dioceses to stay at home, giving up their participation with the masses on Sundays. While some denominations make church services accessible via radio, online live streaming or television, others offer to worship while driving.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: የሮማን ከቶሊክ ቤተክርስትያን ምዕመናን ለአምልኮ እንደይሰበሰቡ ካደረገች ጊዜ ጀምሮና የቅዱስ ጴጥሮስ አደባባይም ከክርስቲያን ሃይማኖታዊ ተጓዦች ነጻ ከሆነ በኋላ፣ ሌሎች የሀይማኖት ድርጅቶችም ሀይማኖታዊ አገልግሎቶችን በመገደብ ህዝብ አብያተ ክርስትያናት ውስጥ ለአምልኮ እንደይሰበሰብ እና በአንድ ቦታ እንደይበዛ ከልክለዋል።
en-mt: Since the Roman Catholic Church allowed congregations to gather for worship and St. Peter's Square was freed from Christian religious pilgrims, other religious organizations have also restricted religious services and prevented people from gathering for worship in churches and mass gatherings in one place.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: የኢራን ጤና ሚኒስቴር በቫይረሱ ስርጭት በተጠቁት ቦታዎች ላይ የአርብ ፀሎቶች መሰረዛቸውን አሳውቋል እና የተቀደሱ ስፍራዎችም በኋላ ላይ ተዘግተዋል፣ ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ ሳውዲ አረቢያ የውጭ መንፈሳዊ ተጓዦች መግባት እንዲሁም ደግሞ የመካ እና መዲና ቅዱስ ስፍራዎች እንዳይገቡ ከልክላለች።
en-mt: Iran's health ministry has announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the virus and the closure of holy sites later, while Saudi Arabia has banned the entry of foreign pilgrims and the holy sites of Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: ይህ ወረርሽኝ ከሁለተኛው የአለም ጦርነት ቀጥሎ በአለም ላይ በሚካሄዱ የተለያዩ ስፖርታዊ ውድድሮችና በሚከናወኑበት ፕሮግራሞች ላይ ከፍተኛ ጫና ሆኗል።
en-mt: This epidemic has put a lot of pressure on various sports competitions and programs held around the world after the Second World War.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: የ 2019–20 UEFA ቻምፒዮንስ ሊግ፣ የ 2019–20 ፕሪሚዬር ሊግ፣ UEFA Euro 2020፣ የ 2019–20 NBA ሲዝን እና የ 2019–20 NHL ሲዝንን ጨምሮ በርካታ የስፖርት ዝግጅቶች ተሰርዘዋል።
en-mt: Several sporting events have been cancelled, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, the 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, the 2019–20 NBA season and the 2019–20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: ወረርሽኙ የ 2020 በጋ ኦሎምፒክ እቅዶችን አስተጓጉሏል፣ በዋናነት በ ጁላይ መጨረሻ ላይ እቅድ ተይዞላቸው የነበር ቢሆንም፣ አለም አቀፍ ኦሎምፒክ ኮሚቴ (International Olympic Committee) 24 ማርች ላይ ዝግጅቱ "እንደገና ከ 2020 በኋላ ነገር ግን ከ 2021 ሰመር ሳያልፍ እንደሚሆን" አሳውቀዋል። ካሲኖዎች እና የጨዋታ ቦታዎች በአለም ዙሪያ ተዘግተዋል እና የ ቀጥታ ፖከር (live poker) ውድድሮች ተላልፈዋል ወይም ተሰርዘዋል።
en-mt: The pandemic has disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally planned for late July, but the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event would "take place again after 2020 but no later than the summer of 2021". Casinos and gaming venues have been closed around the world and live poker tournaments have been postponed or canceled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: ይህም ብዙ ቁማርተኞች ኦንላይን እንዲገቡ ያደረገ ሲሆን፣ ብዙ የኦንላይን ቁማር ድረገጾች የአዳዲስ ተመዝጋቢዎቻቸው ቁጥር ላይ ጭማሪዎችን እንዳዩ አሳውቀዋል። የመዝናኛው ኢንዱስትሪም የተጎዳ ሲሆን ብዙ የሙዚቃ ቡድኖች የኮንሰርት ዙረታቸውን አቁመዋል።
en-mt: This has led to more gamblers coming online, and many online gambling sites have reported seeing increases in the number of new subscribers. The entertainment industry was also affected and many music groups canceled their concert tours.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: ብዙ ትላልቅ እንደ ብሮድዌይ አይነት ቲያትሮች ሁሉንም ዝግጅታቸውን በእንጥልጥል አቁመዋቸዋል።
en-mt: Many large Broadway-style theaters have canceled all shows.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: አርቲስቶች ስራቸውን እንዲያከናውኑ፣ እንዲያሰራጩ እና እንዲያሳትሙ እንደ ቀጥታ የስትሪሚንግ ኮንሰርቶች ወይም ድረ-ገፅ-ተኮር "ፌስቲቫሎች" አይነት ባህላዊ ቀጥታ ስርጭት ችሎታን እንደ አማራጭ በኢንተርኔት ላይ እንዲያዘጋጁ እና እንዲያጋሩ አንዳንድ አርቲስቶች ሁኔታዎችን ቃኝተዋል።
en-mt: Some artists have explored opportunities to host and share their work over the Internet as an alternative to traditional live streaming capabilities, such as live streaming concerts or web-based "festivals."

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: በኦንላይን በርካታ ኮሮናቫይረስ-ተኮር የኢንተርኔት መዝናኛዎች ተሰራጭተዋል፣ ከእነዚህ ውስጥ አብዛኛዎቹ ባልተጠበቀ ሁኔታ ወደ ቀልድ እና መዘናጋት ተለውጠዋል።
en-mt: A lot of coronavirus-themed internet fun has been circulating online, many of which have unexpectedly turned into humor and distraction.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: የ COVID-19 ወረርሽኝ ከተከሰተ ጀምሮ፣ ከፍተኛ የሆነ ማግለል፣ መጤ ጠልነትና ዘረኝነት በቻይናውያንና እስያውያን፣ የምስራቅ እስያ ዘር ባለባቸው ሰዎች እና ከፍተኛ ክስተት ካለባቸው አውሮፓ፣ ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ እና ሌሎች ሀገሮች በመጡ ሰዎች ላይ ተስተውሏል።
en-mt: Since the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic, significant levels of discrimination, xenophobia, and racism have been observed among Chinese and Asians, people of East Asian descent, and people from Europe, the United States, and other high-incidence countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: የፍርሐት፣ ጥርጣሬ፣ ጠላትናት ክስተቶች በብዙ ሀገራት ይበላጥ ደግሞ በአዎሮፓ፣ ምስራቅ ኤሽያ፣ ሰሜን አሜሪካ አእና ፓስፊክ ኤሽያ አከባቢ ታይቶል።
en-mt: The phenomenon of fear, suspicion, and hostility has worsened in many countries and has been seen in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: የየካቲት ሪፖርቶች (ከተመዘገቡት ኬዞች ውስጥ አብዛኛዎቹ የሚሆኑት ኬዞች እስከዚህ ጊዜ ድረስ በቻይና በሚገኙበት ወቅት) በአለም ዙሪያ በተለያ ቡድኖች ልክ የቻይና ህዝቦች ቫይረሱ እንደሚገባቸው ወይም ይህ መድረሱ ተገቢ የሆነ የበቀል እርምጃ እንደሆነ አድረገው ላይ የዘር ስሜቶች ገልፀዋል።
en-mt: The February reports (when most of the reported cases have so far been in China) have expressed racial sentiments in various groups around the world as if the Chinese people deserved the virus or that its arrival was a justifiable revenge.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: በአፍሪካ አንዳንድ ከተሞች ውስጥ የጸረ-ቻይና ስሜት ሲነሳ ታይቷል።
en-mt: Anti-Chinese sentiment has been seen rising in some African cities.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: የዉሃን እና ሁቤይ በቨይረሱ መነሻ ቦታ ስለሆኑ ብቻ አድልኦ እነደሚደርስባቸዉ በተደጋጋሚ ተናግሯል።
en-mt: He has repeatedly said that Wuhan and Hubei are being discriminated against just because they are the origin of the virus.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: ንቁ። ኦንላይን እና ኦፍላይን እና በቫይረሱ በተያዙ አካባቢዎች ላሉት ለቻይንኛ ድጋፍ አለ።
en-mt: Wake up. There is support for Chinese online and offline and for those in affected areas.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: አዲስ ትኩስ ነጥብ በሆኑ እንደ ጣሊያን ያሉ አውሮፓ ውስጥ የመጀመሪያው ከፍተኛ የ COVID-19 ወረርሽኝ ስርጭት የታየባት ሀገር ውስጥ፣ ክስተቱን ተከትሎ ጥርጣሬ እና መጤ ጠልነት ሊከሰት ይችላል። የማሌዠያ፣ ኒውዚላንድ፣ ሲንጋፖር እና ደቡብ ኮርያ ሀገራት ዜጎች የቫይረሱን ስርጭት ለመቀነስ በሚል አላማ ሰዎች ከቻይና ወደሀገራቸው እንዳይገቡ የሚያደርግ የፊርማ ማሰባሰብ ስራዎችን ሲያደርጉ ቆይተዋል።
en-mt: In a new hotspot, such as Italy, Europe's first major outbreak of COVID-19, suspicion and xenophobia are likely to follow the incident. Citizens of Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea have been collecting signatures to prevent people from entering their country from China with the aim of reducing the spread of the virus.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: ጃፓን ውስጥ፣ የ #ቻይናዎችወደጃፓንእንዳትመጡ (#ChineseDontComeToJapan) ሀሽታግ ትዊተር ላይ በብዛት ታይቷል።
en-mt: In Japan, the #ChineseDontComeToJapan hashtag trended heavily on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: በቻይና ህዝብ እንዲሁም ደግሞ ዩናይትድ ኪንግደም እና ዩናይትድ ሰቴትስ ውስጥ ያሉ ሌሎች ኤሽያውያን የዘር ጥቃት፣ እንዲሁም ደግሞ የጥቃት መጠን መጨመሩ ሪፖርት ተደርጓል።
en-mt: Racial violence, as well as increased rates of violence, have been reported among the Chinese population, as well as among other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: የአሜሪካው ፕሬዝዳንት ዶናልድ ትራምፕ ኮሮናቫይረስን “የቻይና ቫይረስን” ነው በማለታቸው ከፍተኛ ትችት የገጠማቸው ሲሆን ዘረኛ እና ጸረ-ቻይና አስኝቷቸዋል።
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has come under fire for calling the coronavirus a "Chinese virus", calling it racist and anti-Chinese.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: በዩክሬን ተቃዋሚዎች ከዉሃን ዩክሬናዉያንን እና ሌሎች የዉጪ ዜጎችን ከዉሃን ወደ ኖቪ ሳንዛሪ አሳፈሮ የሚሄደዉን አውቶቡስ አጥቅተዋል።
en-mt: In Ukraine, protesters attacked a bus carrying Ukrainians and other foreigners from Wuhan to Novi Sanzary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: ከቻይና ጋር ድንበር የምትጋራው፣ ከሰሜን ምስራቅ ህንድ የመጡ ተማሪዎች፣ እናም በዋናው የህንድ ከተሞች የሚማሩ ከኮሮና ቫይረስ ወረርሽኝ ጋር ተያይዞ ትንኮሳ እንዳጋጠማቸው ተዘግቧል።
en-mt: It has been reported that students from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and those studying in the main cities of India have faced harassment in connection with the Corona virus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: በምዕራብ ቤንጋል ዲሊፕ ጎሽ የብሃራቲያ ጃናታ ፓርቲ ስቴት ክፍል ፕሬዘዳንት ቻይና ተፈጥሮን አበላሽታለች እና "ለዚያም ነው እግዚአብሄር እየተበቀላቸው ያለው" ሲሉ ተናግረዋል።
en-mt: In West Bengal, Bharatiya Janata Party state unit president Dilip Ghosh said China has ruined nature and "that's why God is taking revenge on them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: በኮልካታ ውስጥ የሚገኘው የቻይና ቆንስላ አስተያየቶቹ፣ "የተሳሳተ" በማለት በኋላ ላይ አውግዘውታል። ቻይና ውስጥ፣ ዜኖፎቢያ እና ዘረኝነት ቻይናውያን ባልሆኑ ዜጎች ነዋሪዎች ላይ በወረርሽኙ ምክንያት ተፋፍሟል፣ የውጪ ዜጎች "የውጪ ቆሻሻ" እና "ለመወገድ" የታለሙ ተብለው ተገልጸዋል።
en-mt: The Chinese consulate in Kolkata later condemned his comments, calling them "wrong". In China, xenophobia and racism against non-Chinese residents has run rampant since the outbreak, with foreigners described as "foreign scum" and targeted for "disposal".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: በክፍያ ብቻ የሚታዩ ክፍሎች ያላቸዉ በርካታ ጋዜጦች በተወሰኑት ወይም በሁሉም የኮሮና ቫይረስ ሽፋናቸዉ ምክንያት እነዚህን ክፍሎች አስቀርተዋል።
en-mt: Many newspapers with pay-only sections have dropped these sections due to some or all of their coverage of the coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: ብዙ የሳይንሳዊ አሳታሚዎች በበሽታው ከተከፈተው ወረርሽኝ ጋር የተዛመዱ ሳይንሳዊ ወረቀቶችን ተደራሽ እንዲሆኑ ክፍት አድርገዋል።
en-mt: Many scientific publishers have made scientific papers related to the outbreak open access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: አንዳንድ ሳይንቲስቶች እንደ bioRxiv ባሉ ሰርቨሮች ላይ ያገኙትን ውጤቶች በፍጥነት ፕሪፕሪነተ እንዲደርግ አካፍለዋል።
en-mt: Some scientists have shared their results on servers like bioRxiv for faster preprinting.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: አሁን እየመጣ ያለ ኢንፌክሽን የሚያመጣ በሽታ – ኢንፌክሽን የሚያመጣ በሽታ አብዛኛውን ጊዜ አዲስ ሲሆን ወረርሽኝ ወይም ስርጭት ደረጃ ላይ ነው
en-mt: Emerging Infectious Disease – An infectious disease is usually new and is in an epidemic or epidemic stage

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: አለማቀፋዊነት እና በሽታ –የግሎባላይዜሽን አጭር እና የበሽታ መተላለለፊያ መግለጫ።
en-mt: Globalization and disease – A brief overview of globalization and disease transmission.

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: የወረርሽኞችና አለም አቀፍ ወረርሽኞች ዝርዝር – በተላለፊ በሺታ ምክንያት የተከሰተ ሞት ቁጥር
en-mt: List of Epidemics and International Pandemics - Number of deaths caused by smallpox

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: የዱር እንስሳትን በህገወጥ ማዘዋወር እና ከእንስሳት ወደ ሰዎች የሚተላለፍ በሽታዎች ወይም ያልተለመዱ ዱር እንስሳትን ለንግድ ከማዋል ጋር የሚገናኙ የጤና ስጋቶች
en-mt: Illegal wildlife trafficking and the health risks associated with transmissible animal-to-human diseases or the commercial use of exotic wildlife

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: የቤተሙከራ ምርመራዎች ለመተንፈሻ አካል ኮሮናቫይረስ በሽታ 2019 (COVID-19) እንዲሁም ግንኙነት ያለው SARS-CoV-2 ቫይረስ መኖሩን እና ለዚህ ኢንፌክሽን ምላሽ የሚሰጡ አንቲቦዲዎችን የሚያሳውቅ ዘዴዎችን ጥቅም ላይ ያውላል።
en-mt: Laboratory tests for respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the related SARS-CoV-2 virus use methods that detect the presence and antibodies that respond to this infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: በናሙናዎች ውስጥ የሚገኝ ቫይረስ በ RT-PCR የሚረጋገጥ ሲሆን የኮሮና ቫይረስን RNA ለመለየት የሚችል ነው።
en-mt: Virus found in samples can be confirmed by RT-PCR and is able to detect coronavirus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: ይህ ምርመራ ውስን ሲሆን የ SARS-CoV-2 ን ለመለየት የሚጠቅም ነው።
en-mt: This test is limited and useful for the detection of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: በጣም የቅርብ ጊዜ የሆኑ ወይም የነቁ መበከሎቸን ለመለየት የሚረዳ ነው።
en-mt: It helps identify the most recent or active infections.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: የአንቲቦዲዎች መለየት (ሴሬሎጂ) ለምርመራም ሆነ ለህዝብ ክትትል ይረዳል።
en-mt: Detection of antibodies (serology) is useful for both diagnosis and population monitoring.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: የአንቲቦዲ ምርመራዎች ምን ያክል ሰዎች በሽታው እንዳለባቸው ያሳያሉ፣ ይህም ምን ያክል ሰዎች ምልክቱ እንዳለባቸው ነገር ግን ሪፖርት ለማድረግ ትንሽ እንደሆነ ወይም ምንም ምልክት የሌለባቸውን ጨምሮ ነው።
en-mt: Antibody tests show how many people have the disease, including how many have symptoms but have little or no symptoms to report.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: የበሽታው ትክክለኛ የሆነ የመግደል መጠን እና የብዙሃኑ የበሽታ መከላከል አቅም ከዚህ ምርመራ ውጤት ሊታወቅ ይችላል።
en-mt: The actual killing rate of the disease and the immune capacity of the population can be determined from this test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: ውስን በሆነ የመመርመር ስራ ምክንያት ማርች 2020 ላይ የትኛውም ሃገር በህዝቡ ውስጥ ያለው ስርጭት ምን ያክል እንደሆነ እርግጠኛ የሆነ መረጃ የለውም።
en-mt: As of March 2020, no country has reliable data on the prevalence in the population due to limited surveillance.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: እስከ ማርች 23 የትኛውም ሃገር የህዝብ ብዛታቸውን ከ 3% በላይ ያልመረመረ ሲሆን በየሃገራቱ የተደረገው ምርመራ ላይ ከፍተኛ የሆነ ልዩነት አለ።
en-mt: As of March 23, no country has tested more than 3% of its population, and there is considerable variation in the number of tests conducted across countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: ይህ መለያየት የሞት መጠኖች ላይ ከፍተኛ የሆነ ውጤት ለማሳደር ያለው አቅም ከፍ ያለ ሲሆን፣ በአንዳንድ ሃገሮች ውስጥ የሚደረገውን ከትክክለኛው ከፍ ያለ ግምት ስለሆነ ነው።
en-mt: This disaggregation has the potential to have a significant effect on death rates, because it is an overestimation of what is happening in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: በዚያው ሰዓት የሚሆንን ሪቨርስ ትራንስክሪፕሽን ፖሊመሬስ ቼን ሪአከሽንን (rRT-PCR) በመጠቀም ምርመራው እንደ አፍንጫውስጥ ፈሳሽን በመጥረግ ወይም ምራቅን በመጠቀም የሚገኝ ናሙናን መመርመር ያሰችላል።
en-mt: The test, using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), allows testing of a sample obtained using a nasal swab or saliva.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: ውጤቶች ከ ከጥቂት ሰዓታት እስከ 2 ቀንት ባለው ጊዜ ውስጥ ይገኛሉ።
en-mt: Results are available within a few hours to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: ጉሮሮ ላይ ያለን ፈሳሽ ናሙና በመውሰድ የሚደረገው የ RT-PCR ምርመራ አስተማማኝ የሚሆነው በበሽታው የመጀመሪያ ሳምንት ላይ ብቻ ነው።
en-mt: RT-PCR testing by taking a throat swab is only reliable in the first week of the disease.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: ቀጥሎ ቫይረሱ ከጉሮሮ ላይ በመጥፋት ሳምባ ውስጥ መባዛት ይችላል።
en-mt: The virus can then clear the throat and multiply in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: በሁለተኛው ሳምንት ለተመረመሩ የተበከሉ ሰዎች፣ አማራጭ የሆነ ናሙና መሳሪያ ከዲፕ ኤርዌይስ በመምጠጫ ካቲተር ወይም የሳል ውጤት (ምራቅ) ጥቅም ላይ ሊውል ይችላል።
en-mt: For infected persons diagnosed in the second week, an alternative sampling device can be used from the deep airways with a suction catheter or cough output (saliva).

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: ከመጀመሪያዎቹ አንዱ የሆነው የ PCR መመርመሪያ በርሊን ውስጥ በ ጃንዋሪ 2020 ላይ ተሰርቶ የነበረ ሲሆን ሰሪው ደግሞ Charité ነው። በዚያው ሰአት የሚደረግ የፖሊመርስ ሰንሰለት ምላሽ (rRT-PCR) ወደ ኋላ መመለስን በማድረግ፣ በአለም አቀፍ የጤና ድርጅት (WHO) አንዲሰራጭ 250,000 መመርመሪያዎችን ሰርቷል።
en-mt: One of the first PCR tests was developed in Berlin in January 2020 and is manufactured by Charité. At the same time, reverse engineering of polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) made 250,000 tests to be distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: ዩናይትድ ኪንግደምም ጃንዋሪ 23፣ 2020 ላይ መመርመሪያ አዘጋጅታ ነበር። Kogenebiotech የተባለው የደቡብ ኮርያ ድርጅት ክሊኒካዊ ደረጃ ያለውን PCR-መሰረት ያደረገ SARS-CoV-2 የመመመርመሪያ መሳሪያ (PowerChek Coronavirus) በጃንዋሪ 28፣ 2020 ላይ አዘጋጅቷል።
en-mt: The United Kingdom also set up a probe on January 23, 2020. South Korean company Kogenebiotech has developed a clinical-grade PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 diagnostic tool (PowerChek Coronavirus) on January 28, 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: በሁሉም ኮሮና ቫይረሶች ውስጥ የሚገኘውን "E" ዘረመል የሚፈልግ ሲሆን፣ ለ SARS-CoV-2 የሆነውን RdRp ዘረመን የሚፈልግ ነው። ቻይና ውስጥ የ BGI ቡድን ከቻይና ብሄራዊ የጤና ምርቶች አስተዳደር የድንገተኛ አጣዳፊ ጥቅምን ለማግኘት የመጀመሪያ ከሆኑት ድርጅቶች ውስጥ እንዱ ሲሆን ለ PCR- መሰረት ያለው SARS-CoV-2 መለያ መሳሪያ ነው። አሜሪካ ውስጥ የበሽታዎች ቁጥጥር እና መከላከል ማእከል (CDC) የ 2019 ኖቭል ኮሮናቫይረስ (2019-nCoV) በዚያው ጊዜ RT-PCR መመርመሪያ ፓናልን ለማህበረሰብ ጤና ቤተ ሙከራዎች በአለም አቀፍ ወኪል ምንⶐች አማካይነት የሚያሰራጭ ነው።
en-mt: It requires the "E" gene found in all coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene for SARS-CoV-2. In China, the BGI Group was one of the first organizations to receive an emergency grant from the China National Health Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) RT-PCR test panel to public health laboratories through an international agency.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: ከሶስቱ የዘረመል ምርመራዎች ውስጥ በድሮዎቹ የመመርመር መሳሪያዎች ውስጥ ትክክለኛ ያለሆን ሪኤጀንት በመገኘቱ ምክንያት ትክክላኛ ያልሆነ ውጤት ሊገኝ ችሏል እንዲሁም አትላንታ ውስጥ በ CDC ላይ በሚደረግ ምርመራ ላይ ማነቆ የተፈጠረ ሲሆን፣ በቀን ውስጥ በአማካይ 100 ናሙናዎች ስኬታማ በሆን መንገድ በሙሉው የፌብሩዋሪ 2020 ወር ውስጥ ተደርጓል።
en-mt: Of the three genetic tests, an inaccurate reagent was found in the old test kits, and testing at the CDC in Atlanta was disrupted, with an average of 100 samples per day successfully conducted throughout the month of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: እስከ ፌብሩዋሪ 28/2020 ድረስ ሁለት ክፍሎችን ጥቅም ላይ የሚያውሉ ምርመራዎች ሊታመኑ የሚችሉ እንደሆኑ ያልተወሰ የነበረ ሲሆን እስከዚህ ጊዜ ድረስ ሀገራዊ እና አካባቢያዊ ቤተሙከራዎች ምርመራዎችን ለማድረግ ፈቃድ አላገኙም ነበር።
en-mt: As of February 28, 2020, tests using two components were not determined to be reliable, and national and local laboratories were not authorized to perform the tests until this time.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: ምርመራው በድንገተኛ ጊዜ አጠቃቀም ፈቃድ መሰረት በምግብ እና መድሃኒት አስተዳደር ተፈቅዶለታል። ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ውስጥ ያሉ የንግድ ቤተ-ሙከራዎች ምርመራ ማድረግ የጀመሩት መጋቢት 2020 መጀመሪያ ላይ ነበር።
en-mt: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization. Commercial labs in the United States began testing in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: በማርች 5/2020 LabCorp ብሄራዊ የሆነ በ RT-PCR ላይ የተመሰረተ የ COVID-19 ምርመራ እንዳለ አሳውቆ ነበር።
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, LabCorp announced the availability of a national RT-PCR-based test for COVID-19.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics ብሄራዊ የ COVID-19 ምርመራን በ ማርች 9/2020 ላይ ዝግጁ አድርጎ ነበር።
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics made a national COVID-19 test available on March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: ምንም ዓይነት የመጠን ገደብ ያልተወሰነ ሲሆን፣ የናሙና ስብሰባ እና ማብላላት በ CDC መስፈርት መሰረት ሊደረግ ያስፈልጋል።
en-mt: While no dose limit has been determined, sample collection and processing should be performed according to CDC guidelines.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: ሩሲያ ውስጥ የ COVID-19 ምርመራ የተዘጋጀው እና የተመረተው በመንግስት የቫይሮሎጂ እና ባዮቴክኖሎጂ ምርምር ማዕከል በሆነው VECTOR ነው።
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by VECTOR, a state-run virology and biotechnology research center.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ፌብሩዋሪ 11/2020 ላይ ምርመራው በፌደራል የጤና ምርመራ ተመዝግቦ ነበር። በማርች 12/2020 Mayo ክሊኒክ የ COVID-19 ኢንፌክሽንን የሚለይ ምርመራ አዘጋጅቶ እንደነበር ሪፖርት ተደርጓል። ማርች 13/2020 ላይ Roche Diagnostics ከ FDA በከፍተኛ ቁጥር በ 3.5 ሰአት ውስጥ ውጤትን የሚያሳውቅ ምርመራ ለማድረግ ፈቃድ አግኝቶ የነበረ ሲሆን ይህ ደግሞ በ 24 ሰዓት ጊዜ ውስጥ 4,128 ምርመራዎችን ለማድረግ የሚያስችል ነው።
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the diagnosis was registered by the Federal Health Inspection. On March 12, 2020, it was reported that the Mayo Clinic had developed a test that can detect COVID-19 infection. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received approval from the FDA for a test with a maximum response time of 3.5 hours, which allows for 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: ማርች 19∕2020 ላይ FDA የድንገተኛ ጊዜ ጥቅም (EUA)ን ለ Abbott Laboratories የፈቀደ ሲሆን የሚሞከረውም የአቦት m2000 ሲስተም ነው፤ FDA ተመሳሳይ ፈቃዶችን ለ Hologic፣ LabCorp እና Thermo Fisher Scientific ሰጥቷል።
en-mt: On March 19∕2020, the FDA granted Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for the experimental Abbott m2000 System; The FDA has granted similar licenses to Hologic, LabCorp and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: ማርች 21/2020 ላይ Cepheid በተመሳሳይ EUAን ከ FDA ያገኘ ሲሆን 45 ደቂቃ የሚፈጅ ነው።
en-mt: Cepheid also received an EUA from the FDA on March 21, 2020, which takes 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA የ አይሶተርማን ኒውክሌይክ አሲድ ማጉላት ቴክኖሎጂን በ PCR ምትክ ፈቃድ ላይ ይውል ዘንድ ይጠቁማል።
en-mt: The FDA recommends that isotermic nucleic acid amplification technology be used in lieu of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: ይህ የሚቀያየር የሙቀት መጠን ኡደትን የማይፈልግ ስለሆነ እስከ አምስት ደቂቃ በሚሆን ትንሸ ጊዜ ውስጥ ፖዘቲቭ የሆነ ውጤት እስከ 13 ደቂቃ ደግሞ ኔጌቲቭ ውጤትን ያስገኛል።
en-mt: Because this variable temperature does not require cycling, it can produce a positive result in as little as five minutes and a negative result in as little as 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: ዩናይትድ ስቴትስ ውስጥ በአሁን ሰዓት 18,000 የሚሆኑ ማሽኖች ያሉ ሲሆን Abbott ደግሞ በቀን 50,000 ምርመራዎችን ለማድረግ ይቻል ዘንድ ምርቶችን ያፋጥናል። ሞኖክሎናል አንቲቦዲን ጥቅም ላይ የሚያውል ምርመራ በቀጥታ ከ ኖቭል ኮሮና ቫይረስ ኒውክሎካፕሲድ ፕሮቲን (N ፕሮቲን) የሚተሳሰር ሲሆን ልክ እንደ ፈጣን ኢንፍሉዌንዛ ምርመራ ውጤቱን ከ 15 እስከ 20 ደቂቃዎች ውስጥ ያሳያል ተብሎ ተስፋ የሚደረግ ነው።
